column2: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzeHutano hwePfungwa, Doctor Nzuzu, Vobatsira Vane Matambudziko eZvinodhaka Vari kuZimbabwe
column3: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muJacksonville mudunhu reFlorida muAmerica, Doctor Emmanuel Nzuzu, avo vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwepfungwa pamwe nezvekubatsira vane dambudziko nezvinodhaka, vanoti vakazvipira kubatsira vane dambudziko rezvinodhaka vari kumusha. Doctor Nzuzu pari vari zvino vari kumusha kuZimbabwe uko vari kushanda nevanhu vane matambudziko ekutadza kusiya zvinodhaka zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbanje, mapiritsi nedoro, kuburikidza nekuita misangano. Doctor Nzuzu, avo vave nemakore anodarika gumi nemanomwe vachiita basa rekudzidzisa vane matambudziko nezvinodhaka kuburikidza nekushanda muzvipatara zvakasiyanasiyana pamwe nedandemutande ravo, vanoti vakaenda kuZimbabwe nekuona kukura kwedambudziko nezvinodhaka ravanoti rabata nyika. Vanoti kubva pavasvika kuZimbabwe muna Mbudzi, vaita misangano miviri muHarare, uye vane tarisiro yekuti vachange vachiita mimwe misangano kunze kweHarare. Doctor Nzuzu vanoti kune vanoda kubatsirwa vanokwanisa kuvabata panharembozha yavo yavari kushandisa muZimbabwe inoti + 263 776 505 052, kanawo kutsvaga bhuku ravo rakanangana nekubatsira vanenge vaine matambudziko ekukundikana kusiya zvinodhaka rinonzi, “How to Stay Sober”. Vanoda rubatsiro vanokwanisawo zvakare kuenda padandemutande ravo rinoti https://www.howtostaysober.info, apo vanhu vanogona kuenda vachiwana zvidzidzo zvekuti vangakwanise sei kusiya zvinodhaka. Doctor Nzuzu vakaberekerwa kuChipinge vakazoenda kuAmerica muna 2003. No media source currently available

column2: Ticharonga Cosafa patsva: Destombes
column3: SANGANO reCouncil of Southern Africa Football Association (Cosafa) – iro rinoronga Cosafa Cup – rinoti mitambo yegore rino ichadzoserwa kumashure nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakakonzera kuti nhabvu imbomira kutambwa kunyika dzakawanda dzepasi rose.   Mitambo yeCosafa Cup yegore rino yange ichifanirwa kutambwa munaChikumi kuDurban, kuSouth Africa.   Asi muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, munyori mukuru weCosafa, Sue Destombes anoti mazuva achatambwa mutambo uyu gore rino achatariswa patsva sezvo pari zvino vanhu vasati vava kutenderwa  kufamba kuenda kune dzimwe nyika nekuda kwecoronavirus.   “Sekuziva kwemunhu wose, chirwere cheCovid-19 chavhiringidza zvakawanda pasi rose. Saka nekuda kwaizvozvo, mazuva achatambwa Cosafa Cup 2020 achasandurwa.   “Cosafa Cup inotambwa panguva iyo mitambo yePSL inenge yapera, saka nekudaro tichamirira kuti mitambo iyi igopera uye hatizive kuti lockdown iyi ichapera rinhi zvekare kuti miganho yenyika inovhurwa rinhi kuti vanhu vagofamba kuenda kune dzimwe nyika,” anodaro Destombes.   Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzichange dzichitarisirwa kuenda kunokwikwidza kuCosafa Cup uko iine nhoroondo yekuva nyika yakahwina mukombe uyu kakawanda kudarika dzimwe nyika.   Kutaura kuno chikwata ichi chakwanisa kuhwina mukombe uyu katanhatu uye chakapedzisira kuusimudza mugore ra2018.   Gorerakadarika mukombe uyu wakahwinwa neZambia.

column2: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKubatwa neCovid-19 Hwowedzera Zvakare muZimbabwe
column3: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwatanga kukwira zvekare mushure mekumbodzika kwemavhiki apera. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 1,538. Asi mukati memazuva manomwe adarika kusvika Mugovera, vanhu gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13 vashaya nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nevanhu vashanu vakafa vhiki rapera. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 126 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 37, 273. Mumazuva manomqwe kusvika Mugovera chete vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 350 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvachienzaniswa nevanhu zana nemumwe kana kuti 101 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mumazuva manomwe svondo rapera. izvi zviri kuwedzerwao nekusamira zvakanaka kwaita zvinhu muzvikoro. Zvikoro gumi nezvishanu zvine vana nevarairidzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Bazi rezvedzidzo rinoti vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132 vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi pachikoro cheSacred Heart Primary neSacred Heart Girls Gigh kuEsigodini, Matabeleland South. Zvikoro zve Girls College ne Mzilikazi Primary zvine vana vabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti vabereki havafanire kutya hazo nekuti hurumende iri kuita zvose zvakakodzera kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakanyanya vakati hapana munhu ari kubvumidzwa kupinda pachoikoro cheSacred Heart kusvika dambudziko riripo ragadziriswa. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 31 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nemana nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 34, 862 vapora kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 873. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19 vave zana rezviuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu kana kuti 193, 936. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri zviuru makumi maviri nemasere nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 28, 797.

column2: Tsigirai Emery: Mkhitaryan
column3: anoti anofunga kuti sitayera yekutamba nhabvu yaUnai Emery ichabhadhara zvikuru kuArsenal uye anokurudzira vatsigiri vechikwata ichi kuti vatsigire murairidzi wavo mutsva uyu.   Chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi chakakundwa mitambo yacho miviri yekutanga agadzwa pachigaro chinopisa zvichitevera kutsiva kwaakaita Arsene Wenger mwaka uno.   MaGunners akakundwa 2-0 neshasha dzePremier League, Manchester City, mumutambo wekutanga ndokuzokundwa unotevera 3-2 neChelsea musi weMugovera, kunyangwe akambomira-mira akanwisa kaviri.   Mkhitaryan anoti Emery anoda nguva yekuronga tsoro dzake muchikwata ichi sezvo ari kuedza kushandura mashandiro aiitwa naWenger uyo akarairidza Arsenal kwemakore 22.   “Hazvina kunyanyosiyana asi pane zvimwe zvakangosiyana hazvo nekuti vanhu vaviri ava vakasiyana uye vari kutamba kana kufunga nezvimwe zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   “Emery akachengeta mafungiro aWenger asi ari kuvaka zvimwe zvitsva. Anoziva kuti anogona kuunza zvimwe zvinhu zvitsva kuchikwata chino. Hazvisi nyore nekuti zvinoda nguva chete.   “Tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba nekuti tine murairidzi mutsva, mafungiro matsva uye tinoda kutamba nenzira yakasiyana sepanguva yaWenger,” anodaro. – Sportsmail Football

column2: Makerere Oshora Bhiri reKuvandudza Mutemo weMashandiro eMasangano Akazvimirira Oga
column3:
Vamwe vemakereke vanoti bhiri rinoona nezvekunyoreswa nemashandiro
emasangano akazvimiririra oga kana kuti Private Voluntary Organisation
Amendment Bill richaderedza rubatsiro rwavanopa kune vanotambura.

Sachigaro wemubatanidzwa wemakereke mudunhu reMashonaland West
reZimbabwe Heads of Christian Denominations-ZHCD-Pastor Tafadzwa
Mafukidze vanga vari pamusangano wemusi weChina vakati bhiri iri rikave
mutemo richakanganisa basa ravanga vachiita rekubatsira
vanhu munyaya dzezvekudya, dzidzo nezvehutano.

Vachipa pfungwa dzekereke kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemabasa
nekugara zvakanaka kwwevanhu VaMafukidze vakati bhiri iri richaitawo kuti kushanda kwemasangano anoshanda akazvimiririra kuome kudarika zviripo parizvino.

Mumwe mudzimai apinda mumusangano wanhasi Muzvare Patricia Chibaya
vakati hurumende inofanirwa kuregedza vemasangano akazvimirira
vachiita basa ravo vakasununguka. Muzvare Chibaya avo vari kukwikwidza kuita kanzura muChinhoyi
musarudzo dzema by-elections kupera kwemwedzi uno vakamirira bato
reCitizens Coalition for Change vanoti vemasangano akazvimiririra
vakabatsira madzimai akawanda kuti vasatye kukwikwidza. Asi mumwe wechidiki wekuMakonde, VaGodknows Muzhandamhuri vanoti bhiri iri rakanaka rakadaro vachiti vemasangano akazvimiririra vanokurudzira
vanhu kuti vapandukire hurumendep.

Vanhu vakawanda vati panyaya yekufambiswa kwemari ingangoshandiswa
munyaya dzezvehutototo pane mitemo yakawanda inodzivirira izvi
yakafanana neweMoney Laundering Act. Vanhu vakaratidza kusafara nemasimba akawanda ari kupihwa kugurukota
rehurumende pabhiri iri, simba ravati rinogona kushandiswa zvisiri
izvo sezviri kuitika. Gurukota rezvemitemo Vaziyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichatanga yanzwa pfungwa dzevanhu isati yavandudza mutemo. No media source currently available

column2: Vamwe Vashandi Mubazi reKurima Vanoti Hurumende Haisi Kuvabata Zvakaenzana.
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi mubazi rezvekurima, reZimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA) rinoti hurumende haisi kubata zvakanaka vanhu vanoshanda mune zvekurima richiti nhengo dzaro dziri kushandiswa dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuCovid-19. Munyori weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vebazi rezvekurima vanoshandira mumaguta akaita se Harare vari kubatsirwa nezvekuzvidzivirira asi avo vanonzi vashande mazuva ose mumaruwa havasi kupiwa zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19. VaZhou vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa hupenyu hwevashandi vose kusvika kuma wadhi emumaruwa. Studio7 yakundikana kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi rezvekurima, VaGibson Chijarira, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. No media source currently available

column2: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvotaura nezveCoronavirus
column3: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemusi weSvondo vakatora matanho akaomarara mukuyedza kurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chatekeshera pasi rose Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti South Africa kutanga nemusi weChitatu inenge yave kuvhara mimwe miganhu yayo uyo kurambidza kushanyira kana kutambira vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi dzinosanganisira Italy, Iran, South Korea, Iran, Spain, Germany, US, Britain ne China. Zvikoro zviri kuvharwawo musi uyu uye vanhu vari kurambidzwa kuungana kusanganisirawo kumiswa kwemitambo. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kubatwa mumambure ezviri kuitwa kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaOffice Jaka, avo vanobva kuKwekwe, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti South Africa ichakwanisa kupedza dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo riri basa guru. Asi va Jaka vanoti varikunyanyo shungurudzika zvikuru, nevana vavo vaviri varikuita zvidzidzo zveElectrical Engineering kuChina. VaEmmanuel Mboti vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo zvaitwa naVaRamaphosa zvakanaka, vichakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kumiswa kwemitambo kuchakanganisa kurarama kwevakawanda. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidiki, chinogara muSouth Africa, VaMunyaradzi Mukanyiwa, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko ataurwa naVaMbote. No media source currently available

column2: Dare rePamusoro Rotonga Kuti Makurukota Ataurire Ruzhinji nezveMabhizimisi Avainawo
column3: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rinoti gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi nemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende, VaPrince Machaya vakatyora bumbiro remitemo nekutadza kwavakaita kudzika mutemo unosungira vakuru-vakuru muhurumende kubuditsa pachena hupfumi hwavo. Izvi zvinotevera chikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare nenhengo yeparamende inomirira Harare North, VaAllan Rusty Markham kuti bumbiro remutemo ritevedzerwe. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaJacob Manzunzu, nezuro vakatura mutongo wekuti VaZiyambi naVaMachaya havana kudzika mutemo unosungira vakuru-vakuru muhurumende kuti vaburitse pachena hupfumi zvavakati zvinopesana nezvavanosungirwa kunge vakaIta zviri mubumbiro remitemo renyika. Pasi pechikamu 198 (a) chebumbiro remitemo, paramende inofanira kudzika mutemo unoona kuti vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vaburitsa hupfumi hwavo pachena nguva nenguva nekutara zviga zvinofanira kuetevdzerwa nemakambani ehurumende pamwe nekurangwa kwevanenge vatyora mutemo uyu. Nokudaro, VaManzunzu vakapa VaZiyambi naVaMachaya mwedzi mitatu yekuona kuti mutemo uyu wadzikwa. VaMarkham vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nemutongo uyu. VaManzunzu vakati zviri mubumbiro remitemo zvinofanira kuzadziswa uye hazvifanire kutora nguva kuzviita nekudaro vakakurudzira VaZiyambi naVaMachaya kuti vatore matanho ekuti mutemo unobata nyaya iyi wadzikwa. Mumiririri weHighfield West muparamende uye vari nhengo yekomiti yePublic Accounts mudare iri, VaHappymore Chidziva, vati chinhu chakakosha zvikuru kuti mutemo uyu udzikwe vachiti izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru mukurwisana nehuori uhwo hunonzi hwatambarara serunyemba munyika. Mukuru wesangano reTransparency International Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Chikumbu, vati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti vatungamiri vavo vari kuwana sei mari dzavo kuti pasaite huori. Vanokokera bato reZanu-PF mudare reparamende VaPupurai Togarepi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutemo unofanira kutevedzerwa asi vakati zvakakosha kuti nekune vamwe vemabhizimisi zviitwe kuti vasaite huori. VaMachaya vati titaure naVaZiyambi nezvenyaya iyi asi VaZiyambi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo uye vanga vasati vapiundura mibvunzo yatavatumira kuti tinzwe kuti vachapikisa mutongo uyu here kana kuti kwete uye kuti matanho api avachatora. Asi pakunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi, vaviri ava vakaudza dare kuti kudzikwa kwemutemo uyu hachisi chinhu chinofanirwa kuitwa naivo chete vachiti vedare reparamende nedare remakurukota ehurumende vanofanirawo kuunzwa kudare kuti vazvipindurire sezvo vane chekuita nekudzikwa kwemutemo uyu. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, sezvo vari kuRwanda kwavari kupinda mumwe musangano vachimirira paramende.  No media source currently available

column2: Vagari vemuMasvingo Vopomera Mauto neMapurisa Mhosva yeKutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu
column3: Vamiriri vemapato anopikisa vari kupomera mapurisa nemauto mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mashoko aya akabuda pamusangano wakakokerwa neNational Transitional Justice Working Group, musi weChishanu paMasvingo Civic Center. Vemasangano akazvimirira vakati mapazi ehurumende ari kutadza basa raanofanira kuita rekuchengetedza runyararo nenyaya yekuti vari kutsigira nekushandiswa nemusangano weZanu PF. Vanokokera mabasa musangano reNational Transitional Justice Working Group VaDzikamai Bere vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuunza kupodzwa kwemaronda munyika uye kugadzirira kudzokazve National Peace and Reconciliation Commission iyo yakambomiswa nehurumende ichida kukwenenzverwa. Mutauriri we MDCT muMasvingo VaSimon Mupindu ndemumwe wevanhu vakashoropodza mapazi ehurumende. “Mapazi edu senyika ari kurasika zvakanyanya nenyaya yekuti vanofamba nebato rinotonga pane kuti vaite basa vakazvimirira. Havachagoni kuchengetedza runyararo kuvanhu vavanofanira kuchengetedza saka vari kukanganisa bumbiro remutemo.” Mapazi akanyanya kushorwa anoti, mapurisa, masoja, vasori pamwe chete ne madzishe ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva nyekutyora bumbiro remutemo. Muzvare Hilda Sibanda, mutungamiriri weRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe vanoti mapurisa eZRP ari pamberi pakukonzera mhirizhonga. “Isu semusangano tinoona sekuti ndiwo anotonyanyokuwedzera mhirizhonga semufananidzo we mapurisa kuNorton aitorova vanhu vari kudivi rerimwe bato iro riri kutonga.” VaJefreson Chitando veZimbabwe People First vakashoropodza mauto vachiti vari kushungurudza vanhu. “Tinoona kuti bumbiro renyika riri kubvorongwa ne masoja ayo ari kufamba achishungurudza vanhu uye varikufamba vachimanikidza vanhu kuti vavhotere musangano we Zanu PF saka isu toona sekuti ndizvo zvakashata.” Vanoongorora zvematongerwe enyika Dr Takavafira Zhou avo vanotungamirawo sangano rePTUZ vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vakati mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kukundikana ndee matare edzimhosva pamwe nemadzishe. “Vematare kana vaita basa ravo vapa kutonga kwavo vanoshoropodzwa saka vamwe vakutotsigira bato apowo madzishe kumaruzevha vanogova chikafu vachinyima avo vekumapato anopikisa saka izvi zvinoda kudzivirirwa kuti mapazi akadai akurudzire runyararo munyika.” Asi vaimirira Zanu PF pamusangano uyu, VaDaniel Shumba vanova nhengo yeparamende ye Masvingo Urban, vakaramba kuti musangano we Zanu PF unoshandisa mapazi ehurumende kunkonzera mhirizhonga. “Toda kugadzira kuti dai ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwaziva chokwadi pane kungoita ruzha pasina ruzivo, mapazi aya anofanira kutsigirwa nehurumende kana yadaro inokanganiswa nevekunze kwenyika vanoda kubvisa hurumende pachigaro chekutonga.” Asi vemasangano akazvimiririra vanoti vatungamiriri ve mauto, mapurisa pamwe nemadzishe vanogara vachitaura kuti vanotsigira mutungamiriri we Zanu PF VaRobert Mugabe nokudaro izvi zvinoita kuti vazotumwa kuita zvakaipa kuvatsigiri vemapato anopikisa. Vakatizve mhirizhonga iri kuitika munyika ichikonzerwa nemapurisa nemauto inoratidza kuti sarudzo dzekusarudza mutungamiriri wenyika muna 2018 dzinogona kuona mhirizhonga yakawanda nekudeuka kweropa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba kanawo vatauriri vemauto.

column2: Dynamos Yotatsurana neFC Platinum Mumutambo Wakakosha weCastle Premier Soccer League
column3: Dyanamos iyo ine gakava mumba mayo iri kutarisirwa kutamba nechikwata chiri kutungamira gungano reCastle Premier Soccer Leagur cheFC Platinum mumutambo wakatarisirwa neveruzhinji munyika neMugovera. Nhengo yeDynamos Supporters Association Muzvare Judith Nyatsanza vanoti vateveri vechikwata ichi vanofanira kubatana vakananga kuZvishavane kuti vanokunda FC Platinum. Chikwata ichi chirikubaka moto nekudzima zvekuti vateveri vavo havasisina chivimbo nechikwata chavo mumitambo mitanhatu yasara. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaDannyboy Muneri vanoti vachitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada iri kukunda. VaMuneri vanofembera zvibodzwa zvavanofunga kuti FC Platinum inokunda nazvo. Chikwata chiri pachidanho chechitatu Highlanders chiri pamusha neMutare City Rovers apo Caps United iri pamusha zvekare neTsholotsho Pirates. Mutare City Rovers irikusangana ne Ngezi Platinum Stars panguva iyo Triangle ine Chapungu. ZPC Kariba ichatamba neHarare City Chicken Inn ichivhara musangano neNgezi Platinum Stars

column2: Vagari vekuMasvingo Vochema neKukwira kweMitengo yeZvekudya
column3: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vochema-chema kuti mitengo yezvinhu, kunyanya chikafu, yakakwira zvisingaiti muzvitoro apo hurumende iri kuti mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika hwaka gadzikana. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vakashamisika svondo rino mitengo yezvikafu zvakaita sehupfu, mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nenyama zvamuka zvakakwira mutarara. Amai Rumbidzai Magomo vemumusha we Mucheke F, vanoti hupenyu huri kuramba huchivaomera nekukwira kwaita mitengo svondo rino. Chisaga chehupfu cinorema makirogiramu gumi chave kuita mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS kubva mumazana mana muchitoro che OK. Apowo kirogiramu imwe chete yenyama, yaiita mazana matatu emadhora eRtgs yave kuita mazana matanhatu emadhora akaraudzira, zvimwe chete nemafuta ekubikisa. Marita maviri aiita zana nemakumi manomwe emadhora ave kuita mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS. Vagari vazhinji vanoti mitengo iri kukwira asi mihoro yavo isiri kukwira nekudaro zvichawedzera kutambura kwavo sezvo kuwana chikafu chakakwana kunenge konetsa. Muzvare Eve Mamombe, vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yechiakafu munyika kwovashaisa hope. Sangano rinomiriria vashandi munyika, reZimbabwe Congress of Trades Unions(ZCTU), rinoti mihoro yakatarwa nehurumende yevashandi vepasi inokwana zvikamu gumi nezviviri kubva muzana pamari inodiwa kushandiswa nemhuri yevanhu vashanu munyika. Sangano rinomirira vatengi munyika reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinotiwo mhuri yevanhu vatanhatu inoda mari inosvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe yemaRTGS apo vashandi vazhinji vachiwana mari isingapfuuri zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emunyika pamwedzi. Mutungamiriri we ZCTU munyika VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo uye vadzorerwa munguva yehutongi hwevapambepfumi. Studio 7 yatadza kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezve maIndasitiri nekutengeserana munyika, Amai Sekai Nzenza vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo. Asi vachitaura mudare reparamende munguva pfupi yapera Amai Nzenza vakati hurumende iri kushushikana nekukwira kwemitengo uye vachashanda nemamwe mapazi ehurumende kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende inogara ichiti zvinhu zvakanaka munyika iyo mitengo ichikwira kudai. VaLovemore Mashinga vanoti ivo nenyaya yekudhura kuri kuita zvinhu vave kutodya kashoma pazuva. Vanoona nezve hupfumi hwenyika vanoti mitengo iri kukwira mumari yemunyika nekuti iri kukwikwidzana ne mari yekunze yakasimba yeku America iyo yave kubvumidzwa kutenga. column2: Mapurisa Ozara Mudhorobha reChitungwiza Kudzivirira Vanhu Kuratidzira
column3: Mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga-nyonga nemusi weChishanu akapinda Chitungwiza uye ange ari panzvimbo zhinji dzemabhizimisi mudhorobha iri zvisinei nekuti mapato anopikisa pasi pesangano reNational Electoral Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA ange amisa kuratidzira kwaange akaronga mudhorbha iri.Mapuerisa Papinda Studio 7 mudhorobha iri panguva dzekuma9 mangwanani, mapurisa anodzvirira nyonga nyonga ange atozara mumusha weChitungwiza uye motokari dzinodira mvura inovava kana kuti maWater Canons dzange dzakamira mumisha mizhinji yakaita sekwaChigovanyika pamwe nekuSt Marys. Mune mimwe misha yakaita seZengeza, kwaSeke pamwe nepaMakoni mapurisa ange aine tsvimbo nezvombo zvehondo ange achitenderera izvi zvavhundutsa vakawanda. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, VaMarvelous Khumalo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kupinda kwemapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyonga mumusha weChitungiwza kwatadzisa vanhu vakawanda kuenda kubasa kuHarare sezvo vanhu vaange vachifunga kuti muHarare mange makazarawo mapurisa. VaKhumalo vanotiwo kana vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vakanganiswawo nhasi. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muChitungwiza VaBernard Mazhindu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashamisika kuti mapurisa auuya muChitungwiza akawanda zvinotyisa zvisinei nekuti NERA yange yamisa kuratidzira kwange kwakarongwa nhasi. VaMazhindu vanoti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kushushikana zvikuru kuti mapurisa ave kurambidza vanhu kuratidzira kutsutsumwa kwavo. Mumwe mugari wemuChitungwiza, VaCollin Kunaka vanoti vashamisika nekuita kwemapurisa uye vanoti vatadza kuita zvavange vachida kuita vakatya mapurisa. VeNERA vanoti vambomisa kuratidzira vachiti vari kuda kutsvaga nzira dzekuti kuratidzira kwavo kungaite mutsindo sei. Vanotiwo nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dziri kusungwa uye mari yechibatiso iri kudiwa nematare yakawandisisa. Sachigaro wekomiti yeNERA inoona nezvemutemo VaDouglas Mwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kupinda kwemapurisa muChitungwiza kunoratidza kuoma moyo kwemapurisa. Vatiwo vafara chose kuti mapurisa nhasi ashandisa mari yawo kuenda kuChitungiwza kunyange hazvo pasina zvange zvichiitika ikoko. Zvichakadai muHarare mapurisa ange akawanda mumigwagwa semazuva ose kunyange hazvo pasina kuratidzira kwaitika. Kubvira pakatanga veNERA kuratidzira mapurisa ave kugara ari mumumigwagwa zuva nezuva sezvo ari kufungidzira kuti vanhu vanogona kuratidzira nguva ipi zvayo. VeNERA vanoti vacharamba vachiratidzira kudzamara hurumende yavandudza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

column2: VaDos Santos Varadzikwa Nhasi Vopinda Muchikwata cheVatungamiri veNyika dzemuAfrica Kusanganisira VaMugabe Vakafira Kunyika Dzakabudirira
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabatana nhasi kuLuanda, Angola nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica parufu rwevaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJose Eduardo dos Santos avo vakashayikira kuSpain musi wa 8 Chikunguru. VaDos Santos varadzikwa nhasi pazuva ravangadai vasvitsa makore makumi masere. Vamwe vatungamiri vange vari parufu apa vanosanganisira VaCyril Ramaphosa, South Africa, VaFelix Tshisekedi, DRC, uye mutungamiri wePortugal VaMarcelo Rebelo de Sousa. VaDos Santos vari pakati pevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakafira kunyika dzekumawirira nekumabudazuva vachirapwa sezvo zvipatara zvakawanda munyika dzavo nemuAfrica zvisina zvikwanisiro. Vamwe vatungamiri vakafira kunze vanosanganisira VaRobert Mugabe vakafira kuSingapore, VaLevy Mwanawasa vekuZambia vakafira kuFrance, VaMichael Sata vekuZambia zvekare vakafira kuBritain, VaMeles Zenawi vekuEthiopia vakafira kuBelgium, VaUmaru Musa Yar’Adua vekuNigeria vakafira kuSaudi Arabia. Ko chii chinopa kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanorapwa kunze kana vachinge varwara uye dzimwe nguva kufa vari kunyika dzakabudirira? Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica havaendese mari kumapazi ezvehutano sezvinosungirwa nechibvumirano chavakanyorerana cheAbuja Declaration. Chibvumirano ichi chinokurudzira hurumende kuti dziendese zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti kubazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

column2: Mapurisa Anorambidza Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Kufora Vachinyunyuta neKushungurudzwa neMapurisa
column3: Mapurisa muHarare nhasi anonzi anyima mvumo yekufora kunhengo dzesangano revanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, idzo dzanga dzichida kuratidzira kwadzinoti hutsinye hwemapurisa zvichitevera kushaya kwemumwe wavo ari muhusungwa. VaTafadzwa Hilton Tamangani vakashaya vari muhusungwa kuHarare Remand Prison mushure mekusungwa pamwechete nevamwe gumi vanotengesera mumigwagwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mupurisa. Mukuru wesangano reVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vakanga vakanyorera mapurisa neMuvhuro svondo rapera vachiazivisa nezvehurongwa hwavo hwekuda kuratidzira uhwu. Asi vanoti vazoshamisika vachiwana mhinduro inovaudza kuti tsamba yavo yakanga isiri kuwirirana nezvinodiwa nechikamu 25 chemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act (POSA) (Chapter 11:17), nekudaro vakanga vasingafanirwe kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira uku. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Asi vaWadzayi vanoti vari kupikisa danho remapurisa iri kuburikidza nekumhanyira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court. column3: No media source currently available Bhanga re Steward Bank rinoti rine hurongwa hwekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvikwanise kutenga dzimba pasina kusungirwa kubhadhara zvikamu kubva muzana zvemari yemba inenge ichida kutengwa. ​Mumwe weavo vari kuronga chirongwa ichi muAmerica vakamirira Steward Bank, muzvare Revesayi Nyahasha, vanoti vachange vachiparura chirongwa ichi kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuDallas Texas neMugovera. Izvi zvinotevera chirongwa chekutanga chakaitirwa muWashington DC neChishanu chapfuura. "Chirongwa ichi chirikutambirwa zvakanaka chaizvo muAmerica uye tiri kushandisa chizvino zvino chema Apps mukubatsira vanenge vachida kupinda muchirongwa ichi padandemutande. Vanokwanisa kushandisa app yedu mukuvhura bhuku rekubhangi yedu uye mukuzo tenga imba pasi pechirongwa chedu ichi," Muzvare Nyahasha vaudza Studio 7.

column2: NDAROVERA HOKO: CHIPEZEZE
column3: MUBATI wepagedhi weWarriors Elvis Chipezeze anoti atoroverera hoko pagedhi uye acharwa semvumba kuti arambe achibatira chikwata chenyika ichi.   Chipezeze nguva yadarika akapomerwa mhosva nevatsigiri venhabvu vachiti ndiye akadyisa maWarriors apo akazvamburwa 4 – 0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo kumakwishu eAfrcia Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo akaitirwa kuEgypt.   Asi murairidzi wemaWarriors mutsva, Joey Antipas, akamupa mumwe mukana ndokumushevedza kuzotambira chikwata chenyika murwendo rwekurwira kuenda kuQatar 2022 World Cup.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weChipiri chino apo maWarriors ange achangobva kukunda Somalia 3-1, Chipezeze anoti akambobatikana zvikuru nezvakataurwa nevanhu nekuda kwemutambo weAfcon asi akaramba achishanda nesimba.   “Zvakawanda zvakataurwa asi ndakawana rutsigiro kubva kuvanhu vakawanda nemurairidzi wangu uye mhuri yangu. Zvinowanikwa munhabvu asi chikuru kuramba ndichingoshanda nesimba chete,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anotambira Baroka FC yekuSouth Africa – anoti chivimbo china Antipas maari anochikoshesa zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwandapihwa nemurairidzi runondikoshera zvikuru saka ini ndinofanirwa kuramba ndichishanda nesimba chete.   “Kundigadza kwaaita kuve mubati wemaWarriors kunorakidza kuti anovimba neni saka iniwo ndicharwa semvumba uye ndichishanda nesimba kuti ndirambe ndiri mubati wemaWarriors,” anodaro Chipezeze.   MaWarriors akabudirira kupinda mumapoka (group stages) ekurwira kuenda kuQatar 2022 World zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita 3 -1 nemusi weChipiri chino.    Vatambi vanoti Marshall Munetsi, Knowx Mutizwa naKhama Billiat ndivo vakanwisa.   Mumutambo wekutanga wakatambirwa kuDjibouti svondo radarika, maWarriors akakundwa neSomalia 1 – 0.

column2: ‘Ndinoda kutambira maGems’
column3: MUTAMBI wenetball ari kusimukira wepachikoro cheMpopoma High School, kuBulawayo anoti shuviro yake kuzotambira chikwata chenyika chemaGems mune neramangwana.   Zvichitevera kudadisa kwakaita chikwata chemaGems kumakwishu eVitality World Cup ayo akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva pfupi yadarika, mutambo uyu wave kuteverwa nevanhu vakawanda avo vanosanganisira Nicole Ayanda Muzanenhamo (17).   Nguva pfupi yadarika, Muzanenhamo akavhoterwa kuve Player of the Tournament kumakwikwi eStella Netball Tournament ayo akaitirwa kuGweru.     Mutambo uyu wakazohwinwa nePamushana High School iyo yakakunda Chibi mufainari.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Muzanenhamo anoti maGems akapa shungu kuvatambi venetball vari kusimukira.   “MaGems akatifadza nyika yose uye isu sevasikana vechidiki vari kusimukira mumutambo uyu zvinotituma kuti tishande nesimba sezvo tichiona kuti mberi uko kune chiedza chakanaka.   “Ini remangwana rangu ndinoda kuzotambira maGems uye ndizvo ndiri kutoshanda ndakatarisa nekuti zvinouya nemikana yakawanda yakasiyana,” anodaro Muzanenhamo.   Kasikana aka kanoti kanoyemura zvikuru mutambi wemaGems – Felistus Kwanga – uyo akakurira kuBulawayo uye aive muchikwata chemaGems chakaenda kuLiverpool.   “Ndinotevera chaizvo Felistus Kwanga, ndinomutora sasisi vangu saka ndinoda kusvika paasvika mumutambo uyu.   “Kwanga akapfuura nemumitambo yakasiyana kusanganisira Stella Tea U17 Tournament, iniwo ndikaitambawo saka ndiri kuona kuti ndiri kufamba mugwara chairo,” anodaro Muzanenhamo.   Parizvino Muzanenhamo ari kutambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvenetball kuBulawayo.

column2: Kupisa Kwekunze Kotarisirwa Kuenderera Mberi Kunzvimbo Dzakawanda Zvokanganisa Varimi
column3: Bazi rezvemamiriro ekunze remeteorological Services Department rinoti kupisa kwekunze kuchaenderera mberi kunzvimbo dzakawanda kunyangwe dzimwe nzvimbo dzichawana mvura pano neapo. Bazi iri rinoti kutanga musi wa 10 mwedzi uno ndipo pari kutarisirwa kuti pachanaya mvura. Vanokokera mabasa muzimbabwe Farmers Union Amai Margaret Hoshiki vanoti kusanaya kwemvura kwave kupa kuti varimi vakawanda vaomerwe sezvo pasina tarisiro yekuti goho remwaka uno rinenge rakanaka. Vakurudzira varimi kuti vasarambe vachidyarurura Mbeu dzinonoka kuibva. "Tino kurudzira kuti varimi varime zvirimwa zvakadayi semamapfunde mapfupi anokurumbidza kuibva, ne mbesa dzinokurumidza kuibva kana kuti ma "small grain" sezvo mwaka usina kumira zvakanaka," Amai Hoshiki vaudza Studio 7. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Tinokurudzira kuti kana mvura yango tanga kunaya varimi ngava kande mbesa dzinokurumbidza kuibva kana chiri chibage ngava kande mbese chechibage chinonzi tsoko icho chinokurumbidza kuibva." column2: Bazi rezveKugara Kwakanaka kweVanhu Rinoti Vakaremara Vari Kubatsirwa muNguva Ino yeCovid-19 Lockdown
column3: Gurukota rezvemabasa, vashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara vakarasikirwa nemihoro munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, kuburikidza nechirongwa chavakaparura chakanangana nekubatsira vanotambura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuCongo Brazzaville, uko vari kumusangano wechinomwe webudiriro mudunhu reAfrica, kana kuti "Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development", uyo wakapetwa nemusi weChina, Professor Mavima vanoti bazi ravo rakakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu negumi, kana kuti 310 000, pasi pechirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo vave nemakore maviri vaumba bazi rinomirira vakaremara, iro riri kutungamirwa naDoctor Christine Peta. Professor Mavima vanoti munguva ino bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara kuburikidza nehomwe yemari yavakaisa parutivi yekubatsira vanoda kutanga zvirongwa zvekuzvibatsira, uye ivo segurukota vari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vanyorese kumahofisi ebazi ravo ari nyika yose kuti vabatsirwe. column2: Mapato Anopikisa Orwisa Kuti Avewo neChekuita muZEC
column3: Mapato anopikisa ari pasi pemubatanidzwa uri kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe, weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, NERA, nemamwe akazvimirira neMuvhuro akaita musangano neZEC kuti vajekeserwe nezvemamiriro achange akaita zvinhu panguva yesarudzo dza 2018, uye kuti apewo pfungwa dzawo. Vari kutaura vakamirira NERA, VaDouglas Mwonzora vebato reMDC T vanoti semapato anopikisa, vaive nezvinhu zvitatu zvavanoda kuti ZEC igadzirise, zvinosanganisira kuti semapato vange varipowo panosarudzwa neZEC nzvimbo dzekuvhotera. Vanoti vanodawo kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika apindewo mumakomiti eZEC, ayo vanoti akazara nemauto nevasori, uye vanodawo kuti vange varipowo panodhindwa magwaro ekuvhotesa. VaMwonzora vanoti chikuru chanyanya kuti mapato anopikisa adewo kuve nechekuita nemafambisirwo enyaya dzesarudzo neZEC ndechekuti zvinhu zvose zvairerekera kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF. column2: Tinoda kushaina: Mapeza
column3: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum Norman Mapeza anoti ane chishuviro chekuti chikwata chake chive chimwe chezvikuru muAfrica nekudaro vacharwa semvumba apo vari kusangana nedzimwe shasha mumutambo weChampions League.Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, yakabudirira kupinda mumini-league reChampions League uye yakaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Orlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa, Esperance of Tunisia (shasha dzeChampions League) neHoroya yekuGuinea.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga FC Platinum ichikwikwidza mumini-league iyi sezvo kare yaingoburitswa kumaprelimaninary round rekurwira kuenda kumini-league.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Mapeza anoti chikwata chake chiri pachiri nekuti chakashanda nesimba uye chinoda kuve chikuru muAfrica.   “Kunzi unzi uri chikwata chihombe unofanirwa kusangana nezvimwe zvihombe, saka ndizvo zvatiri kutarisira kuona zvichiitika.   “Zvinhu zvatange tichishandira kwemakore akawanda tichimbokundikana, asi tavemo, tinofanirwa kungotenda.   “Zvose tichangozvisiya mumaoko aMwari, ndiye anoziva ramangwana redu kuti rakamira sei uye ndiye achatitungamira mumitambo yedu yose,” anodaro Mapeza.   Mumutambo wekutanga weFC Platinum, chikwata ichi chichasangana neOrland Pirates musi wa11 Ndira kuZvishavane mumutambo uyo inofanirwa kuhwina kuitira kuti itange zvine mutsindo kana ichida kubudirira kufambira mberi mumakwishu aya.   Zvakadai, Mapeza anoti mwaka wegore ra2019 shuviro yechikwata chake kuti chipinde muboka rezvimwe zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders kuburikidza nekuhwinha mukombe weCastle Premiership katatu kakatevedzana.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuZimbabwe, zvikwata zviviri chete zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders ndizvo zvakakwanisa kuhwina mukombe weligi makore matatu akatevedzana.   Dynamos yakazviita kaviri kekutanga kubva mugore ra1980 kusvika 1983 uye ikazozviita zvakare kubva 2011 kusvika 2014 apo yairairidzwa naKallisto Pasuwa kozoti Highlanders yakazvikwanisa kubva 1999 kusvika 2002.   “Isu tinotambira nhabvu kuhwina uye ndizvo tichangoita mwaka mutsva unotevera.   “Asi zvose tinongozvisiira mumaoko aMwari ndivo vanoziva uye ndivo vanotungamira. Hatikwanise kuronga zvepano pasi, Mwari ndivo vanotirongera.   “Asi isu chikuru kuti tirwe kuchengetedza mukombe wedu chete,” anodaro Mapeza.

column2: Platform for Youth Development Yorwisa Kuti Mhuri Dzisabviswa kuMunyokowere, kuChipinge
column3: Sangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth Development rinoti rave kushanda nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights mukuedza kumisa kubviswa kwemhuri dzinodarika mazana mashanu dzigere Munyokowere kuChipangayi, mudunhu reChipinge kuManicaland. Mhuri idzi dzinonzi dzakatopiwa tsamba dzekudzizivisa kuti dzinge dzabva panzvimbo iyi mukati memazuva manomwe, kukundikana kwadzo dzinozobviswa nechisimba. Mutungamiri wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti mhuri idzi dzakatambira matsamba aya, ayo anonzi akanyorwa musi wa 27 mwedzi wapera, dzichiziviswa kuti dzinge dzabva munzvimbo iyi panopera zuva nemusi wa 05 mwedzi uno. VaMadhuku vanoti matsamba aya akabva kuhofisi yebazi rezveminda nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu, kunyange hazvo mhuri idzi dzagara panzvimbo iyi kubva muna 1992 padzakagariswa zviri pamutemo nevaive mudzviti wedunhu iri. Vanoti chakaita kuti mhuri idzi dzigariswe panzvimbo iyi chaive chikumbiro chevarimi vachena vaiveko vaida kuti vabatsirwe nemasvikiro kuchenesa nzvimbo yavo., Asi vanoti chiri kunyanya kurwadza mhuri idzi ndechekuti hurumende haina kutanga yagara navo pasi isati yavapa matsamba ekuti vabviswe aya. Vanoti hapana kana hurongwa huripo hwekuti vana vechikoro vachaita sei, uye hapana nzvimbo yavati varatidzwa yekunzi ndiko kwavachaendeswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvekurima nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Go Warriors Go: Vatsigiri
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chinoda minamato yakasimba apo chiri kunanga kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrican Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo unotanga nemusi weMugovera.   Rwendo rwemaWarriors rwekuenda kumutambo uyu rwange rusiri nyore sezvo gadziriro dzacho dzakambosvika pakumiswa zvichitevera kubatwa kwainge kwaita vatambi 15, kusanganisira dzimwe nhengo dzechikwata ichi, nechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chikwata chaZdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic chakasimuka nemusi weChitatu chakananga kuCameroon uko chichanovhurira mutambo weCHAN chichisangana necheIndomitable Lions cheCameroon.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti makwikwi eCHAN egore rino akasiyana neemakore adarika nekuti maWarriors achange asina vatsigiri.   “Tange tiri kuona zvange zvichiitika mune mitambo yakasiyana yakadai seweFC Platinum, kubirirwa kwayange ichiitwa pachishandiswa Covid-19. Saka tiri kuzvityirawo kuti ndizvo zvinogona kuitika kumaWarriors edu paari kuenda kuCameroon. Tinoda kuti anohwina pasina kubirira uye tiri kuda kuona nhabvu inonakidza ichitambwa.   “Saka isu chatichangoita sevatsigiri kungoisa minamato yakasimba kuti vakomana vedu vanotimirira uye rwendo rwavo rwunge rwakajeka rwuchiendeka,” anodaro Chimedza. Chikwata cheFC Platinum masvondo adarika chakaenda kuTanzania uko chakatamba necheSimba Football Club mumutambo wechipiri wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eCAF Champions League group stages. Vatambi veFC Platinum vachisvika kuTanzania, vakaongororwa denda reCovid-19 asi havana kuziviswa zvakabuda muongororo iyi pachiri nenguva. Chikwata ichi chakazoziviswa kwasara maawa maviri kuti mutambo uyu uchitanga kuti vatambi vacho vashanu vane denda iri izvo zvakakatyamadza FC Platinum ndokukanganisa hurongwa hwavaive vanaho. FC Platinum yakazokundwa mutambo uyu 4-0 zvakaita kuti ibve yaburitswa mumutambo uyu. Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu Adomsi ‘Admoski’ Mukwasi anoti chikwata chaLoga chakasimba zvikuru uye chichanokonzeresa kumutambo uyu zvekuti chichasvika kuquarter-final chaiko.   Munhorowondo yemaWarriors kuCHAN, mugore ra2014 chikwata ichi chakasvika kusemi-fainari yemutambo uyu uko chakazoburitswa neLibya 5-4 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 0-0.   Adomski anoti maWarriors achanyora nhorowondo zvakare gore rino kuCameroon uye vanoda minamato yenyika yese kuti vanokunda.   “Isu mumutambo weCHAN tagara hedu tinositamba zvinonwisa mvura saka naizvozvo tiri kutarisira kuti Loga nevakomana vake vachanotibatira basa. Tichavaisa mumitamato yedu kuti vatambe zvinonwisa mvura uye vagonobudirira kuCameroon.   “Chikwata chedu chakasimba uye vatambi vacho vane tarenda rinodadisa,” anodaro Adomski. Zvakadaro, maWarriors ari kuenda kumutambo uyu ariwo chikwata choga chiri kubva kunyika isiri kutambwa nhabvu pari zvino nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Gore rapera, nhabvu haina kumbobvira yatambwa munyika muno nekuda kwedenda iri uye pari zvino hazvisati zvave zivikanwa kuti mitambo yePremier Soccer Leage ichatambwa here.

column2: Kukwira kweMitengo yeZvakawanda Kwosiya Veruzhinji, Varimi, Vaomerwa
column3: Kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa vakavimbisa masvondo mashoma adarika kuti hurumende ichadzorera mari muzvitengeswa senzira yekubatsira vanhu, vanhu vari kuti hapana chati chamboshanduka munyaya dzemitengo yezvinhu. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kuchema kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvavanoda zuva nezuva, kusanganisira zvekurimisa zvemwaka uno, iri kukwira zvisina mukare akamboona, izvo zvave kusiya vakawanda vachishaya pekutangira. Mutengo wezvekudya zvinosanganisira upfu nechingwa unonzi uri kungokwirawo pamadiro. Semuenzaniso, mutengo wechingwa unonzi wakakwira kubva pamadhora gumi nemana anemasendi makumi manomwe nemashanu ukaenda pamadhora gumi nemasere ane masendi makumi mana nemashanu parofu. Mutengo weupfu wakakwirawo mwedzi wapera nezvikamu zana kubva muzana. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uku hakufanirwe kukatyamadza vanhu nekuti hurumende yakatozivisa kare kuti mitengo yezvinhu ichafambidzana nemisika yemari, iyo inomirawo nemari yekunze kwenyika, zvikuru nedhora rekuAmerica. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti musika wemari uyu hauna kumira zvakanaka sezvo uri kungoenda nzira imwechete, yekudonha kwehuremu hwemari yemunyika. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru weZImbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaThomas Masvingwe vanoti kukwira kwemutengo wechingwa uku kwaomesera veruzhinji, zvikuru vashandi zvikuru, avo vanga vave kurwisa kuti vangokwanisa kuwana chikafu kaviri pazuva, mangwanani nemanheru. Matambudziko ekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu anonzi haasi kunzwengawo varimi, avo vanonzi vapererwa nemazano nekuda kwekuramba mitengo yezvikwanisiro ichikwira. Mukuru weTobacco Industries and Marketing Board, Doctor Andrew Matibiri vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvekurimisa kuri kubata varimi vose, kusanganisira varimi vefodya, izvo zvinogona kudzikisa ndimo mwaka uno. Doctor Matibiri vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanyonetsa varimi kushaikwa kwemagetsi, ayo ari kudzimwa dzimwa, izvo zviri kukanganisa vaya varimi vakanga vadyara fodya yekudiridzira. Tsaga refotereza yepamusoro rine huremu hwemakirogiramu makumi mashanu rinonzi rave kutengeswa muzvitoro zvakawanda zvinotengesa zvekurimisa nemutengo uri pakati pemadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nemazana matanhatu. Tsaga refotereza yepasi rine huremu hwumwechetehwo rinonzi rave kutengesewawo nemadhora emunyika ari pakati pemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemazana mashanu emadhora, zvichienderana nekuti uri kushandisa nzira dzipi dzekubhadhara. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwemitengo zvakanyanya mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari, uyo wanga uchikwidzwa svondo roga roga. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti dambudziko remunyika iri rinogona kupedzwa chete kana pakaitwa munonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru mune zveupfumi pamwe nezvepatongerwo enyika. Kusvika izvi zvaitika, veruzhinji vanonzi vacharamba vachinonga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

column2: CZI Yozeya neChina Mamiriro Akaita Hupfumi
column3: Sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, iro riri kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri, riri kuita musangano wakakosha svondo rino kuti rione kuti zvinhu zvavandudzwa kuitira kuti makambani atange kushanda zvakanaka. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuCrown Plaza muHarare neChina. Vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu vakamirira mapazi ehurumende vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, gurukota rezvemigodhi, VaWalter Chidhakwa, uye gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaMike Bimha. Mukuru weCZI, VaClifford Siwela, vaudza Studio7 kuti vamwe vari kutarisirwa kuvako vamiriri veInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank vari munyika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda neResources Exploitation, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti CZI inofanira kubuda nezvisungo zvainozoendesa kuhurumende kwete kumirira hurumende kuti iuye nezvisungo nekuti inenge yawandirwa nezvekuita. VaMehlomakulu vanoti basa rehurumende ndere kugadzira migwagwa, magetsi nezvimwe kwete kuronga zvemakambani. No media source currently available Sangano reCZI rinoti makambani emuZimbawe ari kushanda ari pasi pezvikamu zvitatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana izvo zvopa kuti vanhu vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa.

column2: WARRIOR AFCON 2019: DeMbare 0, Bosso 0
column3: ZVIKWATA zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders hazvina kana mutambi mumwechete akasarudzwa kuti anotambira maWarriors kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) pamwechete neCosafa Cup izvo zvasiyana nakare apo zvaibura vatambi vakawanda vaive shasha vaitambira chikwata chenyika ichi.   Kubva kare, DeMbare neBosso ndizvo zvaive zvikwata zvikuru muZimbabwe asi parizvino zvinotaridza kuti masamba asiyana sezvo matambiro ezvikwata izvi muPremier Soccer League adzikira zvikuru.   Kune zvimwe zvikwata izvo zvainonekwa sezvidiki zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Semuenzaniso, Herentals FC ine mutambi wayo Richard Hachiro ari muchikwata chemaWarriors,  Yadah Stars ina Leeroy Mavhunga kozoti Chapungu ina Talbert Shumba neFC Platinum ina Lawrence Mhlanga.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevakuru veBosso neDeMbare pamusoro pekudzikira kwaita zvikwata izvi munyaya dzenhabvu.   Sachigaro weHighlanders – Kenneth Mhlophe – anoti ivo sechikwata vari panguva yekuvaka izvo vakatanga gore radarika.   Anoti chikwata chavo ndicho chimwe chine vatambi vechidiki muPSL saka makore anotevera vanogona kubura vatambi vakawanda vachazotambira maWarriors.   “Isu tiri panguva yekuvaka zvakatanga gore radarika, izvi zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese, vatambi vedu vachiri vechidiki.   “Kutaura kuno tine vatambi vaviri vakashevedzwa kuchikwata chemaUnder-23 saka zvinorakidza kuti tiri kufamba negwara chairo,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti Prince Dube – uyo akashavedzwa kumaU-23 – ane ramangwana rakanaka.   “Tina Prince Dube, mutambi ane tarenda rinonwisa mvura. Akaenda kuSouth Africa akanokanganiswa ikoko sezvo aisatambiswa asi akadzoka tiri kumubika patsva, gore rinotevera muchamuona ari kumaWarriors.   “Iye zvino ari kumaU-23, kutoshevedzwa ikoko kunorakidza kuti varairidzi vemaYoung Warriors vanozviziva kuti ane tarenda rinodadisa,” anodaro Mhlophe.   Maneja weDeMbare – Richard Chihoro – anoti chikwata chavo gore rino chakavakwa patsva saka vatambi vavo vachiri kumbodzidzana.   “Zvamunongoziva isu gore rino takatenga vatambi vatsva saka vange vachiri kumbodzidzana, mukatarisa matambiro atiri kuita vave kuita vachibatana, vachigona uye vachisimuka.   “Zvinonetsa kuti vangotanga nekupinda musquad asi tinoziva kuti munguva inotevera kuDeMbare kuchabva vatambi vakawanda vachienda kumaWarriors. Hazviite kuti kushaye vatambi vanobva kuDeMbare vachienda kumaWarriors, kana chikwata chedu changobatana vakawanda vachaenda,” anodaro Chihoro.   Paakabvunzwa neKwayedza kuti pavatambi vari muchikwata chavo parizvino ndevapi vaanofungira kuti vanogona kukwana kumaWarriors, Chihoro anoti, “Parizvino kutaura chokwadi hapana mutambi watinaye anokwana kumaWarriors.”   Zvakadai, nemusi weMugovera uno maWarriors achatanga kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe wavo weCosafa Cup apo achasangana nechikwata chichapedza chiri pamusoro muboka reGroup A kuDurban, kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa chiri kushandisa makwishu aya segadziro dzemutambo weAfcon uyo uchatanga nemusi wa21 Chikumi apo maWarriors achasangana neEgypt.   Mumakwishu ekupedzisira eAfcon ayo akaitirwa kuGabon mugore ra2017, DeMbare yaive nevatambi vaviri vaive muchikwata chemaWarriors vaiti Tatenda Mkuruva uyo aive mubati wepagedhi naElisha Muroiwa uyo aivhara bhora pamwechete naCosta Nhamoinesu.   Bosso yakapedzisira kuita vatambi vakapinda muchikwata chemaWarriors mugore ra2017 apo paiva naPrince Dube naHonest Moyo avo vakatakurwa naMhofu kuenda kuCosafa Cup. Muchikwata ichi maive zvakare naOcean Mushure weDynamos uyo akatamba zvainwisa mvura.

column2: Zimbabwe Yokurukurwa kuMusangano weAfrican Commission on Human Rights
column3: Zimbabwe yange iri mugango kumusangano weAfrican Union unoona nezve kuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kana kuti African Commission on Human and People’s Rights uyo uri kupembererawo makore makumi matatu Africa yatanga boka rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu iri. Nyaya dzakazeyiwa pane zviri kuitika muZimbabwe inyaya yehurumende yekudzinga vanhu papurazi reManzou kuMazowe kuti ripihwe mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, uye nyaya yekudzingwa basa zvisina kujeka kwemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende, VaRay Goba. Mumakore apfuura Zimbabwe ndiyo inonzi yaigara iri mudariro ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu asi zvinonzi zvave nanu. Nyaya yekudzingwa basa kwaVaGoba yange ichinzwikwawo mudare repamusoro nhasi muHarare mushure mekunge sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR raendesa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neJudiciary Servces Commission vachiti vakatyora bumbiro remutemo. Masangano akawanda ekuZimbabwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, kusanganisa ZLHR, ari kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

column2: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri KuBritain Zvoronga Kuratidzira Kwakasimba
column3: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuBritain zvine hurongwa hwekuungana zvichiratidzira mukupera kwesvondo pasi pehurongwa huri kutungamirwa nesangano rinorwira hutongo hwejekerere, reFree Zimbabwe Advocacy Group. Sachigaro wesangano iri, VaJoshua Chigwangwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekupa mukana kuvana veZimbabwe wekuti vazivise pasi rose nezve mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemamiriro azvehupfumi. Hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwuri kuitwa pasi pezita rekuti #zimbabweriseupuktour2016, hwakaonawo sangano iri richikoka varwiri vekodzero vanoti Vasten Zvorwadza, Doctor Patson Dzamara, Muzvare Linda Masarira pamwe nePastor Evan Mawarire ve#thisflag. VaqChigwangwa vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwaifanirwa kutanga neMuvhuro wesvondo rino, asi vakasangana nematambudziko akaita kuti hunonoke, akaita sekunonoka kugadziriswa kwemagwaro ekufambisa aPastor Mawarire pamwe neDoctor Dzamara, asi iye zvino zvinhu zvave kufamba zvakanaka. Vanoti pane hurongwa hwekuti Pastor Mawarire vanotaurawo pamisangano yavakakokwa nemasangano anosanganisira Chatham House pamwe neparamende yeBritain. No media source currently available

column2: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chopona Nepasaka reShumba kuSouth Africa Mushure Mekutemwa neDemo
column3: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaImmanuel Zinja vanoti vanotenda Mwari kuti vachiri vapenyu mushure mekuda kupondwa kwavakaitwa kunzvimbo yeBredasdorp kuWestern Cape mavhiki apfura nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa zvainge zvapihwa mvumo yekuratidzira murunyararo nemapurisa asi zvikazotanga mhirizhonga. VaZinja vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakapona nepaburi retsono mushure mekutemwa nedemo mumusoro nemhomho yevairatidzira ichiti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvidzokere kumusha kwazvo sezvo zvainge zvotorera zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa mabasa. VaZinja vanoti vakaenda kuSouth Africa mugore ra 2014 umo vange vachiita basa rekutema huni vakazotora mudzimai wavo kuti auye kuzogara vano. Vanoti mudzimai wavo uyu akazvitakura parizvino. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vamwe vana vavo vari kuZimbabwe uye vari kutsvaga rubatsiro rwekuti vadzokere kumusha sezvo basa rakapera uye vave kurwara.

column2: Vanhu Makumi Matatu neVashanu Vofa neCovid-19 neMusi weChitatu
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vakashaya nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weChitatau zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe negumi nemumwe kana kuti 3, 7011. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 1, 091 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino vave zana rezviuru negumi nevatatu nemazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nematanhatu kana kuti 113, 526. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 1, 424 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi masere nemaviri zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemana kana kuti 82 994. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mananemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi masere nemakumi matanhatu nematatu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe kana kuti 863, 667. Hurumende inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti ishande zvinotarisrwa

column2: Zvikwata zvehandball hutu kuZambia
column3: ZVIKWATA zviviri zvemutambo wehandball mumapoka anoti Under18 ne21 svondo rino zvakaenda kuLusaka, kuZambia uko zviri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yeAfrica Zone 6 International Handball Federation Challenge Trophy.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwira matikiti ekuzoenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo mikuru yevechidiki ichaitirwa kuMacedonia kozoti yevakuru iyo ichaitirwa kuSpain gore rino.   Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Handball Association, Edson Chirowodza, anoti zvikwata zvavo zvicharwa sebvumba kuti zvigokwanisa kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Uyu mukana mukuru wezvikwata zvedu kuti zvigoenda kunokwikwidza kuEurope zvakamirira Africa, saka takagadzirira nepatinokwanisa napo kuti tigohwina.   “Tinovimba zvikuru kuti svondo rino ticharwa semvumba tigosimudza mukombe nekuti hakuna zvimwe zvatiri kutsvaga kunze kwekuhwina chete,” anodaro Chirowodza.   Mutambo uyu une zvikwata zvisere izvo zvakaiswa mumapoka maviri anoti Group A neB uye chikwata cheZimbabwe chevechidiki cheU19 chakaiswa muboka rine zvimwe zvinosanganisira Madagascar, Lesotho neSeychelles kozoti chevakuru chiri muGroup A zvakare umo mune Madagascar, South Africa neSwaziland.

column2: Hurumende Yombomira Kupa Magwaro Ekurima Mbanje
column3: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTerrance Mukupe, vanoti hurumende yambomira kupa vanhu marenzenise ekurima mbanje nokuti vanhu vanyorera kuti vanoda marezenisi aya vawandisa. VaMukupe vativo hurumende inoda nguva yekumbotura mafemo ichiona kuti hurongwa uhu hungafambiswa sei. "Tanga tisingatarisiri kuti kuchaita vanhu vakawanda kudaro vanoda marezenisi nekuti vanhu vauya vapfuura mazana matatu vanoda marezenisi. Saka unoona kuti kana wange uchida kupa vanhu vashanu chete, unozosarudza sei pasingaitwe huori," VaMukupe vakaudza Studio 7. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Saka tirikunyatsotarisa kuti tozviita sei. Tinofanira kunyatso kunzwisisa kuti chinofanirwa kuitwa chii uye tinozviita sei. Uyezve tinofanira kuronga kuti kunorimirwa kwacho ndekupi uye kuti kune masoja here anochengeta." column2: Mapurisa eZRP Anoparura Chirongwa cheKudzivirira Kuraraira kweHIV/Aids
column3: Zimbabwe Republic Police neChitatu yakaparura hurongwa hwehwaro hwekuyedza kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kwamutare. Hwaro uhu hwakananganga nekubatsira mapurisa ari pabasa uye vari pamudyandigere. Hurongwa uhu hwave nenguva yakareba huchikwenenzverwa paine chinangwa chekuti panosvika gore ra2020 pange pasisina vanoshaya nekuda kwechirongwa ichi. Vanenge vaine chirwere ichi vanenge vachitarisirwa kuwana mapiritsi zviri nyore. Mukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reManicaland, Assistant Commissioner Dorothy Kupara, avo vakaparura chirongwa ichi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mapurisa ose aremekedze hwaro hwavapo kuitira kuderedza kuparira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Kupara vanoti hapana chinonyadzisa pakunoongororwa chirwere cheHIV uye pamwechete nekutora mishonga yacho sezvinodiwa. “Chirwere ichi chakangofananawo neshuga, kana zvakubata gadziriswa, so my officer will ensure kuti zvashandiswa sezvinotarisirwa, uye my officer handifungi kuti pane vachange vachiramba kuzotestwa, uye basa richatowanda kune ma medical officers vachitesitwa.” Mukuru wemapurisa uyu anotiwo hwaro huripo uhu hunobudisa pachena kuti vanenge vaine chirwere havaizotadziswa kusimudzirwa pabasa. Hwaro uhu hunotiwo vanenge varwara vanokwanisa kumbonozorora zvavo vachipora vachizongodzokera pabasa kana vave kunzwa zviri nani. Mumashoko avo ekuvhara chiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru wemapurisa Superintendant Kamanda vanoti hwaro hwavapo uhu huchabatsira mukufambisa basa ravo zvakanaka kunyanya kuvatungamiriri vemakamba kumatunhu ose emunyika. “Ndinoti kumaDispols (District Police Officers) ose kana masangana nechinhu chiri medical chingakunetsai munongoti ko policy inoti chii? Endai munotitoreraiwo ende rinonzi rakatsetseka rinosuppotwa nePolice Act uye ne the current Labour Laws, tinoiti chii zviya, iSimbi yebasa!” Mumwe wechipurisa anorarama nehurwere Sergeant Tawanda Mugeri vachipa huchapupu vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu wega wega, kunyanya kuchipurisa, ararame achiziva paamire mushure mekuvhenekwa ropa. “Panhau yekuudza vamwe vekubasa, inonzi chii zviya, inonzi disclosure, zviri nani inini ndavakuziva zvandiri zvitori right, ndikaenda kuhospital vave kutondishevedza nefirst name nekuti ndikanzwa parwadza ndotomhanya kuti ndizive kuti chii.” Hwaro hwekubudisa HIV/AIDS Policy hwakaitwa pachidyidzanwa nemasangano akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira reNational Aids Council, NAC, Population Services International, PSI nemamwewo. Mukuru weNational Aids Council muManicaland, VaEvans Makoni, vanoti vari kushanda nemapurisa kuti vazadzikise zviri muhwaro mavo. “Chatiunganidza pano inyaya yeZRP AIDS Policy launch iyi, chirongwa chiripo pakuti National Aids Council yakapuhwa mutoro wekuti irwisane nedenda reHIV. Saka mukuita izvozvo tinoti vanhu vari pamabasa kuti vawanirwe nguva yekuitirwa ma programmes inoita shoma saka kambani ikaita policy yaino implemenda zvinobata vazhinji vanenge vari kumabasa toderedza huwandu hwemari yatinoshandisa pakurapa nekuti vanhu vanenge vadzivirira.” Vakuru vechipurisa havana kuda kuburitsa pachena kuti chirwere ichi chakapararira zvakanyanya seyi muZRP, kunyangwe hazvo ongororo ichitaridza kuti kuchipurisa kumwe kwemamwe mapoka emabasa kwakatekeshera chirwere ichi kusanganisira kuchiuto, nekuvatyairi vedzimotokari dzinofamba mitunhu mirefu. Hwaro hwakaparurwa uhwu hucharamba huchiongororwa nekugadzirisa kuti hukwanise kufambidzana neshanduko inenge iriko uye nenguva. No media source currently available

column2: VaChiwenga Havasati Vaita Musangano naVanachiremba neVakoti Vari Kuramwa Mabasa
column3: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika varizve gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, pamwe nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, VaJasper Chimedza, havasati vaita musangano nevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba avo vave nemwedzi miviri vachiramwa mabasa. Vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti vari kuda kuwedzerrwa mari uye kuti vawaniswe zvikwanisiro muzvipatara. Asi vachitaura nezvekudomwa kwaVaChiwenga nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera, munyori mukuru mudare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakati mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, vaida kuti VaChiwenga vatange basa nechimbi chimbire kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa mubazi rezvehutano munguva iyo nyika yatarisana nedambudziko reCovid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaChiwenga kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi tabata munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Doctor, Aaron Musara, avo vanoti hakuna musangano wati waitwa. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vati hakuna chavati vanzwa kuvakuru mubazi rezvehutano nezvekugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. column2: Muzvare Linda Masarira Voendeswa kuChipatara
column3: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu Amai Linda Masarira avo vakapedza mazuva makumi masere vari kujere reChikurubi mushure mekusungwa vachiratidzira zvisiri pamutemo vakaendeswa kuchipatara muHarare husiku hweChipiri mushure mekunge vatanga kurwara. Kumbogara mujeri uu kunonzi nevamwe ndiko kwopa kuti Muzavre Masarira varware. Shamwari yaMuzvare Masarira, VaOstallos Siziba avo vakambovharirwawo kuChikurubi vanoti vakakatyamadzwa nehurwere uhu sezvo vainge vaswera navo vachinzwa zvakanaka muswere wose. VaSiziba vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti Muzvare Masarira vachiri kuongororwa navanachiremba asi vanoti parizvino zvinoratidza kuti chipfuva chavo hachina kumira zvakanaka. VaNqobizitha Mlambo vanoti Muzvare Masarira vanogona kunge vakatapurirwa chirwere vari mujeri reChikurubi iro risina kumira zvakanaka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogaroshoropodza majeri emunyika vachiti haana hutsanana pamwe nezvekudya zvakanaka. Muna 2011 dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzakashanyira majeri mashanu emuno dzikabuditsa gwaro rairatidza kuti kumajeri hakuna mvura yakachena, zvekushandisa zvakakwana pamwechete nezvekudya zvinovaka muviri. Vasati vapinda muchipatara Muxvare Masarira vakaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko rimwe guru riri kuChikurubi nderezvekudya sezvo vanhu vachidya zvisina kukodzera. No media source currently available

column2: VaMugabe Voparura Hurongwa hweGwaro Idzva reVavhoti kuState House
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChina vari kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekutanga kwekunyorwa kwegwaro revavhoti kuState House. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rita Makarau vaudza Studio 7 kuti pavachabva kuState House vachaenda kuHarare International Conference Centre. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa naVaMugabe mashoko akaburitswa naVaMugabe ekuti hurongwa uhu hutange zviri pamutemo kubva musi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa 1 Ndira gore rinouya. VaMugabe vakaburitsa hurongwa uhu mugwaro rehurumende regovernment gazette. Amai Makarau vati vamwe vanhu vachazotanga kunyoreswa zviri pamutemo kana michina yose yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota yebiometric voter registration. Parizvino michina yakauya inosvika mazana mana uye iri kushandiswa mukudzidzisa vanhu avo vachanodzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu nezvenyaya yekuvhota. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Votadza Kutora Mari Dzavo kuMasvingo
column3: Vagari vekuMasvingo vatadza kutora mari dzavo mumabhanga nhasi, izvo vakawanda vanoti zvichavhiringa hurongwa hwavo hwezororo rekisimusi. Muguta reMasvingo manga musina mufaro nhasi zvichitevera kutadza kutora mari kumabhanga kwaitwa nevagari vakawanda. Mumwe wevanhu vasiri kufara, uye ari mutori wenhau, Energy Bara, anoti atadza kutora mari kubhanga rake reCBZ. "Zvinhu zvacho zviri kuita zvichitoshata pakapinda mutungamiri mutsva takafunga kuti zvichaita nani but zvavakutoshata ike zvino nhasi ndatouya kubank handina kana kuwana kana cent, pa bank hapana vanhu nhasi not nekuti pane mari asi hapana kana mari saka hapana kana shanduko yatati taoona sevana veZimbabwe," Bara anotsanangura. Mitsetse inogara iri mumabhanga mazuva ose, yange isiko, sezvo mabhanga asiri kupa vanhu mari. VaPilani Ngoniye vanoti kushaikwa kwemari panguva ino kunorwadza zvikuru uye zvinhu zviri kutowedzera kushata chero hazvo pava nehurumende tsva. “Tashaiwa mari kana cent tatodzoserwa kumusha totoshaya kuti tofamba neyi kudzokera kumusha uyezve handifungi kuti kisimusi yedu ichanakidza sezvo muMasvingo muno hamuna kana bank riri kupa vanhu mari, haa hurumende tsva iyi yakangofana neyaivapo sharu, yaivapo ikange nani, vakangoita recycle vanhu asi system ndoimwe, it’s from bad to worse,” vadaro VaNgoniye. Muzvare Esther Chimanikire vati kushaikwa kwemari kunovhiringa mufaro wevanhu pazororo rekisimusi rinofanira kufarwa. “Isu hatitozivi kuti krisimasi yedu inenge yakamirasei, izvezvi ndatodzosewa kubanka hanzi hatina mari apa ndinoda kuenda kumusha hakuna eco cash, kana swipe hakushandiswi card saka mbudzi dzacho tinouraya sei, zvakatotiomera kana vanobva joni vanochinjisa sei ma rands avo,” vadaro VaChimanikire. Mumwe mushandi wemubhanga aramba kudomwa zita rake anoti kushaikwa kwemari muMasvingo kwakatanga nemusi weMugovera. Vanhu vakambopembera apo vemabhanga vakawedzera mari yavaipa vanhu svondo ragadzwa mutungamiri wenyika asi iye zvino zvadzokera pazvaiva. Mabanga emuMasvingo akaita seZB ne NMB ari kupa vanhu makumi maviri emadhora pazuva, ukuwo mabhanga eCBZ, Standrad Charted neBarclays achipa makumi mashanu emadhora pasvondo rose. No media source currently available

column2: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa muBulawayo Vozeya reMangwana Ravo
column3: Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo vanoti vanoda kuti kanzuru iwedzere nguva yayakavapa yekuti vabve pane imwe nzvimbo yavari kutengesera kuitira kuti vawane nguva yakakwana yekuenda kunzvimbo itsva dzavanofanirwa kutengesera vari. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa nevamwe vevanotengesa paGodini. Vanhu ava vakapiwa kusvika pakupera kwemwedzi uno kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi apo pari kuda kuvakirwa nzvimbo inenge iine zvitoro nemahofisi ichange ichinzi EGodini Mall. Kambani inofanirwa kuvaka nzvimbo iyi inofanirwa kutanga basa musi wa 1 Kurume, svondo rinouya. Murongi wemabasa muBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaVincent Donga, vanoti vaita musangano nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo vachiiudza kuti vanoda kuwedzerwa mazuva. Mumwe wevanotengesa paGodini, Amai Sekai Ndlovu, vabvuma kuti kanzuru yaive yavaudza kuti vanofanirwa kubva panzvimbo iyi uye kuti vakaudzwa nzvimbo itsva kwavari kufanirwa kunotengesera vari. Asi vati vane kushushikana nekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vave nenguva vachitengesera ipapo uyewo havana chokwadi chekuti kwavanonzi vaende kwacho vachange vachiwana vanhu vanovatenga vakawanda here sevavaichiwana paGodini. Munyori mukuru weBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaDumisani Ncube, vatsigira kuti vanotengesera paGodini vanoda kuwedzerwa nguva yekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vakanonoka kuudzwa kuti vanofanirwa kubva. Vati sezvo kutengesa kuri iko kunopa raramo kuvanhu ava, kubviswa kwavo hakufanirwe kuti kuitwe zvechimbi-chimbi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wekanzuru, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, kana kubva kuna meya, VaMartin Moyo, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi kanzuru yakazivisa gore rakapera nezvekuvakwa kweGodini Mall uye kuti vanotengesa vari panzvimbo iyi vaizofanirwa kubva. Kana yapera kuvakwa EGodini Mall inonzi ichavewo nenzvimbo itsva yevanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana. Nzvimbo yeEGodini Mall inotarisira kuvakwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kuitira Kuti Mari Iri Kunze Zvisiri paMutemo Idzoke
column3: Bhanga guru renyika razivisa neChitata kuti pane matanho ari kutorwa kudzora mari dzakabudiswa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo, uye imwe yemari yacho yakatodzoka munyika. No media source currently available Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti dzinotyira kuti hurumende ichatadza kudzora mari yese yakabuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mari iyi yakaburitswa nevanhu vane chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura muHarare mushure mekubuda kwenyaya yekuti pane zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvaichengeta mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe emadhora mubanga reHSBC kuSwitzerland, iro riri kunzi raishanda richityora mitemo yekufambiswa kwemari zvakanaka pasi rose, mukuru weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vati hurumende iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti mari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemitemo yadzorwa munyika. VaMangudya vati patori nehurongwa hwekudzora mari idzi, uye dzimwe dzemari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemutemo, dzatova munyika. VaMangudya vazivisa kuti mamiriyoni zana emadhora ange iri kunze kwenyika zviri kunze kwemutemo yakatodza zvichitevera zvisungo zvebhanga ravo zvekuregerera nekupa mukana kune avo vari kuchengeta mari kunze zvisiri pamutemo kuti vaidzore. Vati mamiririyoni makumi matanhatu nemasere emari iyi akatodzoka uye bhanga ravo riri kuramba richitaura nevanhu nemakambani anochengeta mari zviri kunze kwemutemo kuti adzore mari iyi. Asi varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya yeHSBC vachiti pari zvino vachiri kuongorora kwakabva mari yevanhu vanonzi vaichengeta mari kubhanga iri. Pasi pemutemo zvizvarwa zvemuno zvinoshanda kunze kwenyika zvinobvumidzwa kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika. Asi mutemo haubvumidze kuti vanoshandira munyika kana vemabhizimisi emuZimbabwe vachengetedze mari kunze kwenyika vasina kupihwa mvumo neRBZ. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vakamboshanda kubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati mari iyi ichanentsa kudzoka kwayo. Vati izvi zvaiitwa nevakuru vakuru muhurumende nemunyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye hapana anokwanisa kuti vadzore mari idzi. Vatiwo panofanira kudzikwa mitemo inopa masimba kubhanga guru renyika kuitira kuti rinongorore mapindiro nemabudiro emari munyika. Vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzehufpumi uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinotoda kuti veRBZ kuti vasunge dzisimbe kuti mari iyi idzoke kumusha. Asi VaMangudya vati vane mari dzichiri kunze vanosanganisira vaye vasina kuunza mari mushure mekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, vakatanga kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika vasina mvumo yeRBZ pamwe nevaya vaiita bhizimisi munyika asi vachinochengeta mari yavo kunze kwenyika. VaMangudya vati pave nezvizvarwa zvakawanda zvemuZimbabwe zvinogara kunze kwenyika uye zvizhinji zvavo zvave kutumira mari kumusha. Vati mari inotomirwa nezvizvarwa zviri kunze kwenyika yakakwira kusvika pa$840 million gore rapfuura, kubva pa$790 million muna 2013.

column2: Zim shasha yeIKF Africa Champions
column3: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Korfball chakasimudza mureza wenyika kuZambia uko chakahwina mukombe weInternational Korfball Federation (IKF) Africa Champions ndokuwana tikiti rekunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup iyo ichatambirwa kuChinese Taipei gore rinotevera.   Achitaura vachangodzoka kubva kuZambia, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Korfball Association arizve mutungamiri weIKF Africa – Tarirai Chadebah – anoti chikwata chavo chine mufaro mukuru nekukunda kwachakaita.   Kuhwina kwavakaita kuZambia kunoreva kuti Zimbabwe pari zvino ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yese mumutambo wekorfball. Africa ichange ichamirirwa neZimbabwe neMorocco iyo yakahwina mutambo werimwe boka reNorthern Region.   “Senyika, tiri kufara kuti takakunda kuZambia ndokuhwina tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuChinese Taipei.   “Kuhwina tikiti iri pamwe chete neMorocco kunoreva kuti senyika tiri kufamba mugwara chairo uye tiri kuziva zvatiri kuita. Saka tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba kuti tirambe tichisimukira mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.   Anoti chikwata chavo hachisi kumbozvipa nguva yekuzorora nekuti vanoda kubva vatotanga gadziriro dzeWorld Cup izvozvi.   “Tinoziva kuti patinoenda kuWorld Cup tinotarisirwa pasi asi isu tinoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu tigovarakidza kuti tiri shashawo.   “Saka hatina nguva yekuzorora, takangobva kuZambia ndokusvika takutotanga kuronga rwendo rwedu rwekuenda kuChinese Taipei kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.

column2: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanotambira Nyomba yeCovaxin Kubva kuIndia
column3: Chikamu chekutanga chenhomba yeCOVAXIN inodzivirira Covid-19 yakapiwa Zimbabwe neIndia serubatsiro chapinda munyika, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachigamuchira mushonga uyu panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport muHarare. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti vachigamuchira rubatsiro urwu, VaMnangagwa vatenda zvikuru mutungamiri weIndia pamwe nehurumende yeIndia, vachiti rubatsiro urwu rwauya panguva yakakodzera. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vati Zimbabwe iri panyika dzekutanga dzakave nehurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba. Vanonzi vakokawo vemabhizimusi vekuIndia vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi munyika kuti vashandise mikana iri kuunzwa nechirongwa cheNational Development Strategy NDS 1. Mumiriri weIndia muZimbabwe VaVijay Khanduja ndivo vasvitsa nhomba iyi kumutungamiri wenyika. VaKhanduja vatiwo rubatsiro urwu mucherechedzo wehukama hwakasimba pakati peZimbabwe nenyika yavo yeIndia. VaMnangagwa vaperekedzwa nemutevedzeri wavo uye vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga pamwe nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. India yakapa Zimbabwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu, 75 000, asi zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, kana kuti 35 000 ndizvo chete zvakwanisa kupinda munyika, zvichireva kuti imwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi mana ichatevera munguva pfupi inotevera. Zimbabwe yakawana zvakare rubatsiro rweimwe nhomba yeSinopharm kubva kuChina mukutanga kwemwedzi uno uye yakatengawo zvakare imwe nhomba yekuChina yeSinovac. Hurumende yakabvumidzawo kushandiswa kwenhomba yekuRussia, yeSputnik V. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani yeBharat Biotech ichishanda pamwechete nesangano rinoona nezvetsvakurudzo dzemishonga muIndia, reIndian Council of Medical Research. Nhomba iyi inobayiwa kaviri, kepiri kachibaiwa mushure memazuva makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 ekunge munhu atora nhomba yekutanga. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN inonzi yakaratidza zvikamu makumi masere nechimwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 81 percent, zvekushanda kwayo kudzvirira Covid-19 pavanhu vanenge vasina nhoroondo yehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi mushure mekunge vabaiwa nhomba yepiri. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa pa Nottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti chinhu chakanaka chose kuti Zimbabwe yawana imwe nhomba kubva kuIndia, asi vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende ichifanodzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro penhomba inenge ichizopinda munyika nhomba iyi isati yapinda. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti izvi zvinozobatsira kuti veruzhinji9 vanenge vave neruzivo nechakare panozopinda mushonga uyu munyika, pane kuti vanhu vatange kudzidziswa nezvawo iwo wazara munyika. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo hurumende inofaniorwa kutenga mushonga wakawanda unenge wafarirwa nevanhu wakawanda kuitira kuti vanhu vasazosanganisirwa mishonga kana vachinge vonobaiwa nhomba dzepiri vachizopiwa unenge wakasiyana nenhomba yekutanga. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa kuNgwarira Mushonga weCovid Kubva kuRussia
column3: Bepanhau reHerald rinoti Zimbabwe neRussia dziri kuronga kudyidzana munyaya yekutsvaga mushonga wekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe . Izvi zvinotevera kupihwa nemusi weSvondo, kweZimbabwe zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus nemishonga neRussia nemumiriri wenyika iyi muZimbabwe VaNikolai Krasilnikov. Vachitambira zvipo izvi, VaMangwiro vakatenda Russia vakati Zimbabwe inoda chose kudyidzana nenyika iyi munyaya dzemishonga. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kungwarira mishonga inobva kuRussia iyo yakazviti yawana nhomba yekurapa Covid-19 inonzi Sputnik-V. Asi nyika dzakawanda dzinosanganisira Germany, France, Spain neAmerica dzinoti nhomba iyi yakangoitwa zvechimbi chimbi pasina kutevedzera zvose zvinodiwa. Bazi reUnited Nations reWorld Health Organization rinotiwo richiri kuda kuongorora mushonga uyu. Russia iri kuti hayo nyika idzi dziri kuita godo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti tinzwe kuti Zimbabwe yakapihwa mushonga upi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kungobvuma mishonga kubva kuRussia pasina kunyatsotsvakurudza nezvemishonga yacho. column2: Zimbabwe Haisati Yavhura Mabhodha Ayo?
column3: Vamiriri vehurumende kumuganho weBeitbridge neSouth Africa vanonzi nezuro vakazivisa kuti nyika haisi kuzovhura miganho yayo nhasi, zuva riri kuvhurwawo miganho yenyika yeSouth Africa, sezvanga zvakatarisirwa nevakawana. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross-Border Traders Associationa, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vakaudzwa nezvedanho iri nezuro pamusangano wavakaita nevamiriri ava. South Africa inonzi yakazivisa kuti yaizovhura miganho yayo nhasi, izvo zvakapawo vana veZimbabwe tarisiro yekuti nyika yavo yaizoitawo zvimwechete. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe yakagara yazivisa zvayo kare kuti yaizovhura chete nhandare dzendege musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove nhasi. Miganho pamwe nenhandare dzendege zvakavharwa muna Kurume senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kanawo munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, kunyange hazvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichirira. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vatiwo vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaJuru. No media source currently available

column2: Mbappe haasi kuzouya: Guardiola

Zvakabuda mumapepanhau kuti City ichada kuendera mutambi uyu wekuFrance, uye PSG ichidawo kutengesa vatambi kuti mabhuku ayo azadzikise zvinodiwa nemitemo yefinancial fair play.
