column2: IMF Inoti maBond Notes Haangagadzirise Dambudziko reMari muZimbabwe
column3: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund, kana kuti IMF, rinoti kuparurwa kwakaitwa mari yemabond notes neZimbabwe hakupedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Mashoko aya ari kuuya apo Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kutumira matikitivha kuzvitoro kuti isunge vanonzi havasi kuendesa mari kumabhanga nechimbi chimbi zvave kunzi zviri kukonzera dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Asi mukuru weIMF muAfrica, VaAbebe Aemro Selassie, vakaudza vatori venhau muWashington DC kuti kuparura mabaond notes hakungapedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Vanoti Zimbabwe inotofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti igadzirise mitemo inopa kuti hupfumi hugadzikane ikwanise kutanga kutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika yowana mari. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti vanotenderana neIMF asi vachiti Zimbabwe inofanira kumira nyaya dzehuori. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe Doctor Gift Mugano vanotenderanawo nemaonero eIMF. Asi mukuparura mari yemabond notes gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakati anobatsira. VaMangudya vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanya kuita kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinyanye kunetsa inyaya yevemakambani vasiri kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Nekuda kwefungidziro iyi RBZ yave kutumira matikitivha eFinancial Intelligent Unit kunomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Vachitsinhira, gurukota rezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamsa vanoti pasi pemutemo we Bank Use Promotion Act [Chapter 24:24] vemabhizimisi vanofanira kuendesa mari kumabhanga mukari mezuva rimwe chete. VaDenford Mutashu mutungamiri wesangano re Confederation of Zimbabwe Retailers vanoti vanotenderana nedanho raVaMangudya. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vanotiwo vanotenderana neRBZ. VaMoyo vati mari ikasaenda kumabhanga zvinopa kuti vanogadzira zvinhu vatadze kuhodha zvinhu kunze. Asi Doctor Mugano vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaMangudya kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa dhora rekuAmerica nedzimwe mari dzekunze muna 2009 mushure mekunge dhora remunyika ratanga kushaya simba zvisina mukare akamboona. Kusvika parizvino, RBZ inoti yakwanisa kudhinda mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe yemabond notes. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neIMF Apo Makambani Otadza Kubhadara Mitero kuZIMRA
column3: Nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inenge yoramba ichinetsa zvichitevera mashoko eZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, ekuti iri kutadza kuunganidza mari yemitero yavange vachitarisira kubva kuvanhu nemakambani. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari muridzi wekambani yeManagement Solutions, VaLuxon Zembe, avo vaimbova mutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, vanoti vanhu vose vanofanira kutsigira zviri kuitwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, zvekuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi vachishanda neIMF. Zimbabwe pari zvino haisi kupihwa zvikwereti nenyika uye mabhanga ekunze nepamusana pekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mamwe makurukota ehurumende kusanganisira rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwawo, pamwe rezvevakarwa hondo, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vange vachishora VaChinamasa zvikuru vachiti vari kurasika nekuda kuumba hukama neIMF neWorld Bank. Mari dzemitero inobatwa nehurumende dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende, kugadzira migwagwa, zvikoro, magwenya emagetsi, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa. Mukati memwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga kwegore rino, ZIMRA yakawana mari inosvika US$1,66 billion asi iyo yaitarisira mari inosvika US$1,76 billion. Sachigaro webhodhi reZIMRA, Amai Willia Bonyongwe, mumashoko avo mugwaro rezvemamiriro emari yemitero, vanobvuma kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwapa kuti makambani akawanda atadze kubhadhara mitero. Vanotiwo vakayedza kupa makambani nguva yakareba yekubhadhara zvikwereti vachiyambira kuomesera vari kuramba kubhadhara mari dzemitero vachiviga mari kuti ZIMRA isaone zviri kuitika, asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida . Makambani ane zvikwereti kuZIMRA zvemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZIMRA, VaGershom Pasi, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. column2: Amai Makarau Vanoramwa Kupinda Musangano Vachiti Vaneta neKunyombwa
column3: Musangano wange wakarongwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika watadza kuitwa muHarare neChipiri mushure mekunge sachigaro weZEC, Justice Rita Makarau, vabuda mumusangano uyu vachiti vaneta nekubatwa neseri kweruwoko nemapato aya. Amai Makarau, avo vange vakatsamwa zvikuru, vaudza vamiriri vemapato aya, kuti semaonero avo, misangano yavanoita nemapato aya haisi kushanda nekuti nekudaro vachagara pasi seZEC voona kuti voita sei. Vati mapato aya anovashoropodza nekutaura zvisina kunaka pamusoro pavo mumapenhau nyaya dzinofanira kutaurwa mumusangano wakaita sewange uchifanira kuitwa neChipiri. Amai Makarau vapawo mapato muenzaniso wenyaya dzakabuda mumapenhau eThe Daily News pamwe NewsDay uye vati havasi kuzobvuma kuramba vachibatwa neseri kurowoko nemapato aya. Vatiwo musangano wanhasi wange usinei nekuda kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa mangwana nemamwe mapato ange auya kumusangano uyu. Amai Makarua vabva vaudza dzimwe nhengo dzeZEC nevashandi vekomisheni iyi kuti vabude muimba mange muchifanira kuitirwa musangano uyu ndokuenda kuhofisi kwavo vachisiya vamiriri vemapato aya vari vega. Asi izvi hazvina kufadza vamiriri vemapato ange auya kumusangano. Vamwe vamiriri vemapato aya vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naAmai Makarau kuvashora zvakanyanya uye vanofanira kuziva kuti vanobhadharwa nemari yemitero inobhadharwa neveruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi mushure mechinguvana, mapato aya azobvumirana kutuma nhume dzawo kunoita musangano naAmai Makarau muhofisi mavo. Vachitaura apo vapedza musangano naAmai Makarau, munyori mukuru weMDC – T, zvakare vari mutauriri wekomiti yemapato ezvematongerwo enyika panhaurirano neZEC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati vaudza Amai Makarau kuti vakapedzesera vaenda kumapepanhau nekuti ZEC yange isina kupindura tsamba yavo pamusoro pekutengwa kwemichina ye Biometric Voter Registration. Asi VaMwonzora vati vazobvumirana naAmai Makarau kuti vanofanira kuramba vachiita misangano nemapato aya asi panofanira kurongwa kuti hwaro hwekuti misangano iyi ichafamba sei. Asi dzimwe nhengo dzemapato aya dzakaita saVaKudakwashe Bhasikiti vePeople First, vati mapato aya anofanira kuchisiyana neZEC otsvaga imwe nzira yekuti sarudzo dzingafambiswa sei munyika. VaKizito Kuchekwaavo vanoshanda kubazi reCommisariat reZanu PF vati bato ravo haritsigiri zvaitwa nemasangano ari muNational Electoral Reform Agenda pamwe neCoalition for Democracy uye vati semaonero avo danho ratorwa naAmai Makarau rakanaka. Zvichakadai, veNERA vanoti pamvumo yavapihwa yekuratidzira, vanzi panofanira kuungana vanhu vasingadarike zviuru zviviri nemakumi mashanu uye havasi kubvumidzwa kufamba mumigwagwa. Mapurisa anoti vanhu ava vanofanira kuungana panhandareiri kuseri kweHarare International Conference Centre uye vanhu gumi chete ndivo vachabvunmidzwa kunosiya gwaro renyunyuto kuna Amai Makarau. Mapato ari muNERA anoti haasi kufara kuti hurumende yava kuda kutora hurongwa kwekutenga michina yeBVR kubva kuUnited Nations Development Fund sezvo achifungira kuti izvi zvinoita kuti hurumende ipindire mumafambisirwo esarudzo dza2018. column2: Vatambi vetsiva votambira kunze
column3: VATAMBI vetsiva vanonzi vave kuenda kune dzimwe nyika uko mutambo uyu wave kutenderwa kutambwa vachinotsvaga raramo.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose kubvira muna Kurume gore rino nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mamiriro ezvinhu aya akaona vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana vachikwangwaya sezvo vange vajaira kurarama kuburikidza nemitambo iyi.   Asi, pari zvino mitambo yakasiyana yakatanga kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwematanho ekurwisa kupararira kwedenda iri. MuZimbabwe, mitambo yakawanda haisati yave kutenderwa kutambwa izvo zvinonzi zviri kuona vamwe vatambi vetsiva vachienda kunyika dzinosanganisira South Africa, Tanzania neMalawi.   Miganhu yakasiyana yenyika ichakavharwa kune veruzhinji uye nhandare dzinosvikira ndege kubva kunze kwenyika dzakavhurwa nguva pfupi yadarika zvichitevera kuvharwa kwadzange dzakaita zvakare nechinangwa chekumisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Clyde Musonda anove puromota wetsiva anoti chirwere cheCovid-19 chakanganisa zvakawanda sezvo vave kurasikirwa nevatambi vachienda kune dzimwe nyika.   “Hatisi kuziva kuti tiri kuenda kupi nekuti hatisati tapihwa mvumo yekuti tichironga mitambo yetsiva, kune dzimwe nyika vave kutoronga uye mitambo iri kutambwa. Vatambi vazhinji muno vanotoraramiswa nemari inobva kutsiva saka vave kutiza vachienda kune dzimwe nyika kuzozama raki ravo                                                                     ikoko.   “Isu hatina zvatinokwanisa kuita kana kuvaudza kuti musaende, zvinotiremera nekuti hatina chekuvapa pari zvino. Zvinhu zvose zvakamira nekuda kweCovid-19 saka vave kutoenda kune dzimwe nyika kunotsvaga kurarama nekutamba mutambo uyu,” anodaro Musonda.   Musonda anoti vatambi vetsiva vari kutambudzika zvikuru nekuda kwekushaiwa zvokuita munguva ino yeCovid-19.   “Havasi vatambi vese vakabatsirika nemari yeRelief Fund yakauya uye vakaiwana vacho imwe yakatopera.   Saka kuti varambe vakagara kuine mimwe mikana kunze kwenyika zvinonetsa, ndizvo zvave kuvatuma kuti vaende. Tiri kuita zvekuzonzwa kuti vatoenda hameno kuti vanenge vaenda sei,” anodaro Musonda.   Pane mimwe mitambo yakamiswa nguva yadarika nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 munyika muno.   Mitambo iyi inosanganisira waCharles Manyuchi uyo aifanira kusangana naMuhamad Sebyala wekuUganda vachirwira bhande reWorld Boxing Federation Association Supreme Middleweight newaTinashe Mwadziwana aitarisirwa kusangana naPaulus “The Rock” Ambunda wekuNamibia.

column2: Hatichazviita zvakare: PSL
column3: PREMIER Soccer League inoti ine chivimbo chikuru chekuti varidzi vepembe havapamhe zvekare zvavakaita svondo radarika izvo zvakaona vachiramba kuridza mitambo yePSL ikazosvika pakumiswa. Svondo radarika, vatsigiri venhabvu vakakatyamadzwa zvikuru nechiitiko ichi apo varidzi vepembe vakaramba kunoridza mumitambo yePSL vasingataure chikonzero chacho.   Izvi zvakazoona PSL ichinyorera kuZifa ichibvunza kuti sei zvainge zvaitika, Zifa ndokuvimbisa kuti zvaisazodzokorodzeka zvekare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, mutauriri wePSL — Kudzai Bare — anovimbisa vatsigiri venhabvu kuti mitambo yePSL svondo rino ichatambwa pasina chinokoneso sezvakaitika svondo radarika.   “Chakachaya svondo rino, mitambo yePSL iriko uye hakuna chichakonesa kuti itambwe. “Mushure mekunge nyakanyaka yesvondo radarika yaitika, takanyorera kuZifa tichibvunza kuti sei zvainge zvaitika, ivo vakatipindura vachitivimbisa kuti hazvidzokororwe zvekare.   “Ndiko kusaka makaona kuti svondo radarika takakwanisa kuronga mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup semi-final iyo yakatambwa zvakanaka. Saka svondo rino mitambo iriko,” anodaro.   Bare anoenderera mberi achiti, “Vatsigiri venhabvu tinovakurudzira kuti vasatye, mitambo iriko svondo rino, zvose zvakagadziriswa, varidzi vepembe havambodzokorodze zvavakaita svondo radarika.” Zvakadaro, mumitambo iriko svondo rino, Dynamos ichienda kuChiredzi kunosangana neTriangle United musi weSvondo kuchiti muHarare muchange mune Harare Derby iyo ichaona CAPS United ichisangana neHarare City.   Uyu uchange uri mutambo wekutanga waLloyd Chitembwe achisangana nemaSunshine City Boys ayo aakatiza masvondo adarika achidzokera kumusha kuKepekepe.

column2: ‘NHABVU INODA PAINE VATSIGIRI’
column3: MUTAMBI wechikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors necheYeni Malatyaspor chekuTurkey, Teenage Hadebe, anoti nhabvu hainakidze kutamba munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mwaka wenhabvu weTurkish Super Lig – uko Hadebe ari kutambira – unotarisirwa kudzoka mumasvondo ari kutevera.   Mitambo mizhinji pasi rose yambenge yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chaurauya vanhu vakawandisa. Asi kutanga masvondo achangodarika, kune dzimwe nyika nhabvu yava kuita ichidzoka asi ichitambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Muhurukuro dzange dzichiitwa kuTurkey, pane fungidziro huru yekuti mitambo yenhabvu yeko inogona kusimudzira musi wa12 Chikumi.   Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuTurkey, Hadebe anoti ari kufara kuti nhabvu yave kudzoka asi anoti zvikwata zvinofanirwa kugadzirisa pavanotambira kuti pange pakachena uye pakachengetedzeka panyaya dzeutano.   “Kunyangwe hangu ndiri kufara kuti tave kudzoka kuzotamba nhabvu zvekare, asi zvandaona nekudzidza zvange zvichityisa. Vanhu vari kufa kunze uko, saka tinofanirwa kunge takachengetedzeka uye takangwarira tichitevedzawo mutemo nekurudziro dzeveutano.   “Ndanga ndasuwa nhabvu yangu nekuti ndiyo inondichengeta, saka ndiri kutarisira kutamba zvakanaka zvekare,” anodaro.   Kunyangwe zvazvo achiti ari kutarisira kudzoka kwenhabvu, Hadebe anoti zvichamuremera kutamba munhandare dzisina vatsigiri sezvo iye ange ajaira kutamba pamberi pechaunga chevanhu.   “Tajaira kutamba nhandare dzakazara nevatsigiri vachitikuza. Zvino izvi zvitsva kwandiri, saka zvichandiremera nekuti vatsigiri vanotipa manyuku-nyuku ekutamba zvakanaka.   “Asi totongojaira zviripo nekuti pakupera kwezuva tinofanirwa kubata basa, uye tiine utano,” anodaro muchinda anoti kana achitamba kumashure kwechikwata chemaWarriors uyu anoita zvekusunga chishwe chaicho.   Svondo richangodarika nhabvu yakatanga kutambwa kunyika yeGermany asi munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Mimwe yemitemo yakaiswa mitsva ndeyekuti vatambi venhabvu havachatenderwa kukwazisana nemaoko uye kana vakanwisa, pakupembera havabvumidzwe kumbundirana.

column2: Ishe Charumbira Vanoudzwa neDare Kuti Madzishe Haapindiri Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
column3: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaClement Phiri, vakatura mutongo neChitatu wekuti Ishe Fortune Charumbira vakatyora mutemo apo vakataura mashoko ekuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. Dare iri rakati Ishe Charumbira vanofanirwa kurangwa nemitemo yezvematunhu. VaPhiri vakapawo Ishe Charumbira mazuva manomwe ekuti vaudze vanhu kuburikidza nemapepanhau, nhepfenyuro nepaterevhizheni kuti hapana ishe anofanira kutora divi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dare iri rakakomekedza kuti Ishe Charumbira vaburitse pachena kuti vakanganisa nekutaura kwavo kuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinoti madzishe nemasabhuku havafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kunyange hazvo vamwe vavo vachiramba vachiita izvi. Nyaya iyi yakakwidzwa kumatare nesangano reElection Resource Center, ERC. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Ishe Charumbira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembosha yavo. Mukuru weERC, VaTawanda Chimhini, vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo uyu vakati madzishe anofanira kutonga asina divi raanorerekera. No media source currently available

column2: Dare Rinoti Nyaya yeKuri Kudhindwa Magwaro eKuvhotesa Inzwikwe Chimbichimbi
column3: Dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa rinogadziriswa gwaro rekuvhotera pamwe ne ink ichashandiswa pakuvhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaPisirayi Kwenda, vatura mutongo uyu panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri wePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, VaTendai Biti, pamwe nemutauuriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vachiti inzwikwe musi wa 30 mwedzi uno usati wadarika. VaBiti naVaMafume vakaenda kudare repamusoro vachida kuti komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, iise pajekerere nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa pamwe ne ink ichanyikwa zvigunwe nevanhu vanenge vavhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. Gweta raVaBiti naVaMafume panyaya iyi, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vaudza dare kuti nyaya iyi inofanira kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatotara zuva resarudzo uye vachakwikwidza musarudzo idzi vachitarisirwa kusvitsa mazita avo kudare rinotambira mazita evachada kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi re nomination court neChina. Mumapepa ari pamberi pedare, VaBiti naVaMafume vanoti kutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa kunofanira kuitwa zviri pachena kuitira makambani ose anokwanisa kutengesera ZEC bepa iri awane mukana wakaenzana uye zvinhu zvichiitwa zviri pachena kwete zvakaitwa neZEC kuti yakangofuma yave kutaura kuti bepa iri richabva kune imwe kambani iri kuSouth Africa yaisiri kubudira veruzhinji pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pachena. Gweta reZEC, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vabvuma kuti nyaya iya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi pasina kupikisana naVaBamu. Zvichakadai, mapato mazhinji ari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino aswera achimhanya-mhanya kuti aendesa mapepa awo ku nomination court iyo ichagara mangwana mumatunhu ose emunyika mangwana. No media source currently available Zvichakadai, matare awanawo vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vasina mhosva pamhosva yavanga vachipomerwa yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Josephine Sande, vatura mutongo wekuti vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo, havana mhosva yavakapara. Mutongi wedare ati makasha embumburu dzakashandiswa dzakawanikwa kumba kwaVaKasukuwere pamwe nekuboorwa kwemadziro pamwe nekupwanyika kwakaitwa mahwindo emba yavo kwakakonzerwa nekuridzwa kwakaitwa pfuti munguva yeOperation Restore Legacy zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa, zvinoratidza kuti hupenyu hwaVaKasukuwere hwakange hwave panjodzi. Mutongi wedare aenderera mberi achiti nehupfumi huna VaKasukuwere uye semunhu anofamba nepasipoti yevanhu vanoremekedzwa, kana kuti diplomatic passport, hazvaikodzera kuti VaKasukuwere vangobuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo pasina chikonzero chakati tsvikiti. VaKasukuwere vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaKasukuwere ndevamwe vemakurukota ehurumende akatiza munyika pakaitwa chirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy nemasoja achitungamirwa nemukuru wawo panguva iyi, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekunge VaMugabe vapidigurwa. VaKasukuwere vakazodzoka munyika mwedzi wapera mushure mekupedza mwedzi mitanhatu vari kunze kwenyika kwavakaenda muhupoteri. No media source currently available

column2: Grain Millers Association of Zimbabwe Yoyambira Kukwira kweMutengo weChibage
column3: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe riri kuyambira kuti mitengo yechibage nehupfu ichakwira zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma anotevera sezvo pasina kunyatsowirirana pakati pesangano iri nehurumende panyaya yekutenga chibage kunze kwenyika. Sangano iri rinoti harisi kukwanisa kupihwa mvumo negurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, kuti vatenge chibage kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBrazil. Sangano iri range richitenga chibage kuZambia asi riri kuti riri kukundikana kuti ripinze chibage kubva kuZambia nekuti marori ekutakura chibage ichi mashoma. Sangano iri rinotiwo Zambia yamira kutengesa chibage, asi izvi hazvina kujeka nekuti sangano reMillers Association of Zambia chete ndiro rakapa kurudziro iyi kuhurumende. Asi gurukora rezvekurima munyika iyi, VaGiven Lubinda, vainge vati Zambia ine chibage chakawandisa icho inofanira kutengesa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaLubinda sezvo vadaira nharembozha yavo vati vange vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka. VaMade havanawo kudaira nhare yavo. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvegwara rehurumende, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, avo vanonzi vakanyorerwa tsamba neGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, vati vari pazororo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, havanawo kudaira nharembozha yavo. Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumatura enyika uye pave kuda kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa. Vashorawo VaMade vachiti havasi kuda kutaura navo nezvekugadzirisa dambudziko rekushomeka kwechibage. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Ropa paZuva reKucherechedza HIV/AIDS
column3: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva reWorld Aids Day nemusi weMugovera kuGlendale. Mazowe, kuMashonaland Central. Mhemberero idzi dzaiitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti Ziva Paumire rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vachenekwe ropa kuti vaonekwe kuti vane hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Vanhu vanokurudzirwawo kuti vaongororwe zvimwe zvirwere zvinosanganisira gomarara, zvirwere zvepabonde, rurindi, shuga kana kuti diabetes nezvimwe zvisina zviratidzo zvinooneka. Mhembero dzekucherechedza zuva iri dzakaitirwa kuGlendale, kuMazowe mudunhu reMashonaland Central nemusi weMugovera, zuva rinocherechedzwa World Aids Day pasi rose, uko kwakaungana zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Gurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo vakaudza gungano iri kuti Zimbabwe ichiri nerwendo rwukuru maringe nekuti vanhu vange vachiziva pavamire. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti pasina kuongororwa hutachiwana hweHIV, munhu haangakwanise kuti awaniswe mishonga yema anti-retroviral, kana kuti ARVs, kuchecheudzwa uye kuti vanaamai vakazvitakura vakwanisewo kudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu kumwana. VaMoyo vakaenderera mberi vachitsanangura nezvedingidira remhemberero yegore rino, iro rakanangana nekuparadzwa kwechirwere ichi, Zimbabwe paichasvika gore ra2030. Vakati chirwere cheHIV chinopera kana dungamunhu akaziva paamire maererano nezvechirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vasina chirwere vagozvichengetedzawo. VaMoyo vakayeuchidza vagari vemudunhu reMashonaland Central kuti vaite zvoutsanana hwepamusoro nokuti chirwere cheCholera chakanyukawo kuMount Darwin mudunhu iroro. Studio 7 yakakwanisa kutaura nevamwe vanhu vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV avo vakataura kuti mishonga yema ARVs, iri kuvabatsira chaizvo. Mumwe wevari kushandisa mishonga iyi ndaAmai Christine Pfidzai. Amai Edna Runeto vakatiwo vakatoroorwa nemunhu asina HIV vakatozvara vana vaviri nokuti vari kunwa mapiritsi aya sekurairwa kwavanoitwa naanachiremba. Amai Joana Kasirori vakati vararama nehutachiwana hweHIV kwemakore anodarika makore makumi maviri zvokuti vatove mukuru wechimwe chikoro muHarare. VaJosephat Chinembiri Tarenyika vati vakambosungwa vakagara mujere vasingawani mishonga, izvo zvakazoita kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kudare reConstitutional Court kuti vakwanise kupiwa mishonga yeHIV vari mujeri. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, avo vakanga vari munyarikani pagungano iri, vakati vari kuyedza nepavanokwanisa kuti pashaike mwana anozvarwa aine hutachiwana hweHIV. Vakayambirawo vanhu vari kutaura kuti vawana mushonga unorapa HIV, vakati hakuna mushonga unodarika maARV ari kupiwa varwere kuzvipatara pari zvino. Amai Mnangangwa vakatiwo hapana mudzimai anofanirwa kuzvara mwana ane hutachiwana hweHIV nokuti hurumende yakaisa matanho ekuti mudzimai wese akazvitakura aongororwe uye agopiwa mishonga yekuti mucheche ari mudumbu asabatira hutachiwana. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols vakudza gungano iri kuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kubva muzana muZimbabwe vari kunwa mishonga yemaARV zvekuti sangano rekuAmerica re President’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief, PEPFAR, rakatowedzera mari inodarika bhirioni rimwechete remadhora ekuAmeica kuti ishandiswe pakurapa vanhu vane hutachiwana munyika muno. Sachigaro weNational Aids Council, NAC, VaEvaristo Marowa vakataurawo kuti Zimbabwe ine tarisiro yekuzadzikisa zvinangwa zve 90-90-90 Global Targets zvekupedzisa HiV neAids mugore ra2030. VaMarowa vakaenderera mberi vachiti izvi zvinokwanisika bedzi kana vanhu vakaziva pavamire. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mana ezviuru, 1, 4million, vari kurarama nehutachiwana hwe HIV uye vari pachirongwa zvakare chekunwa mapiriritsi emaARV. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe, US$77 million, vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV pasi rose uye vanhu mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu, US$35 million, vakatofa nekuda kweHIV pasi rose. column2: Britain Inoti Inoshuvira Sarudzo Dzakachena muZimbabwe
column3:
Mumiriri weBritain muZimbabwe Amai Catriona Laing vanoti nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti muZimbabwe muve nesarudzo dzakachena dzinotambirwa nevanhu vose vachiti Britain iri kutarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti hurumende ichawana sei michina yeBiometric Voter Registration. Vati nyika yavo inonzwisisa kuchema-chema kwemapato anopikisa panyaya yekuti michina iyi inofanirwa kuwanikwa nenzira yakajeka.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 parutivi pechiitiko chekukumikidzwa zviri pamutemo kwembatya nemimwe midziyo inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto muBulawayo nemusi weMuvhuro Ambassador Laing vati nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti Zimbabwe itevedzere hwaro hwesarudzo hwenyika dzeSADC uyewo kuti iteerere zvakataurwa nevesangano reAfrican Union kuti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti munyika muve nesarudzo dzakachena.

Amai Laing vati hururmende yeBritain haingakwanise kupindira padanho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti ndiyo ichatenga michina inoshandiswa pakuita Biometric Voter Registration asi vati muzinda wavo uri kutevera wakatarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti izvi zvichaitwa nenzira yakajeka. Amai Laing vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko chekukumikidzwa kwembatya nemichina inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto kukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nevesangano reOperation Florian rinove sangano rekuBritain rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega mukubatsira vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana-siyana munya dzekurwisa moto.

Ambaasador Laing vatenda vaShephard Ndlovu vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe asi vachishanda vari kuBritain avo vakabatsira kuti hukama pakati pekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nesangano reoperation Florian huvepo. Vati kunyange hazvo hukama pakati pehurumende yeZimbabwe neyeBritain huchimbonetsa rubatsiro rwakapiwa nesangano reOperation Florian hunoratidza kusimba kunoramba kwakaita hukama pakati pevanhu venyika mbiri idzi.


Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yakatanga hukama nesangano reOperation Florian mugore ra2009 uye kubvira muna 2011 kusvika pari zvino, kanzuru iyi yawana motokari gumi dzekurwisa moto uye vashandi vayo vachidzidziswawo nezvekurwisa moto.

VaMartin Moyo meya weguta reBulawayo vati rubatsiro rwavari kuwana kubva kusangano reoperation Florian rwakakosha zvikuru kuchitariswa dambudziko rekushikwa kwemari munyika vachitiwo rubatsiro urwu runoita kuti guta ravo rifambirane nemamwe maguta pasi rose munyaya dzekurwisa moto.

Pasi pehukama hwesangano reOpertaion Florian kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yave kushanda nemamwe makanzuru emamwe madhorobha uye kwemavhiki maviri apfuura, vamwe vashandi vezvemoto vemakanzuru aya vange vachiita zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana zvine chekuita nekudzivirira moto.

VaKhumbulani Ndlovu avo vanove Leading Fire Officer muguta reBulawayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nezvidzidzo zvaawana uye vave neshungu dzekushandisa zvavakadzidza kuti vabatsire vagari vemuBulawayo.

Rubatsiro rwawanikwa nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kusvika pari zvino rwakakosha madhora anopfuura mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu. No media source currently available

column2: MDC Alliance Yopika Kuti Ichatora Dunhu reMasvingo Urban muSarudzo
column3: Nhengo dzebato reMDC Alliance dziri kuvimbisa kubvuta dunhu redhorobha reMasvingo, iro rakatorwa neZanu PF musarudzo dza2013, vachiti chigaro ichi ndechavo kubva pavakatanga musangano weMDC. Vachitaura ne Studio7, vari kumiririra MDC-Alliance musarudzo dzeparamende, VaJacob Nyokanhete, vanoti rwendo runo havasi kuzorega Zanu PF ichivatorera chigaro chavo. VaNyokanhete vanoti pasarudzo dzemwedzi uno ivo nevatsigiri vavo havasi kuvata vachifamba vachipinda mudzimba (door to door) umo vari kutsvaga rutsigiro muvanhu kuti vasatorerwerezve chigaro ichi. VaNyokanhete vanoti kubva musarudzo dzeparamende dza2000, 2005 uye dza2008 MDC yaingokunda Zanu PF mudhorobha reMasvingo asi zvinhu hazvina kufamba mushe musarudzo dza 2013 idzo dzakaona Zanu PF ichikunda. Mumwe wevatsigiri ve MDC-Alliance ange achifamba nevamwe mudzimba mumusha wekwa Majange nhasi, Muzvare Ruth Mapiye, anoti vari kutaura nevanovhota mudzimba vachivavimbisa kugadzirisa nyika nekudaro vanotora dhorobha nemakanzura awo ose gumi. VaVasivenyu Chimombe vari kumirira MDC-Alliance ku Ward 6 musarudzo dzemakanzura vanotiwo vanotarisira kukunda zvine mutsindo vachiti vari kushanda nenhengo yavo iri kukwikwidza musarudzo yeparamende kuti vakunde vose uye nemutungamiriri webato ravo VaNelson Chamisa. Asi vari kumirira Zanu PF muMasvingo Urban, VaBenard Taguma Mazarire vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti chigaro ichi hachichafi chakadzokera kuMDC-T vachiti vanochidzosa kubato ravo. VaMazarire vanoti vari kutsvagawo rutsigiro zvakasimba uye vachishandisawo nzira iri kuitwa neve MDC Alliance yekupinda mudzimba. Asi sachigaro wevechidiki muMDC-Alliance muMasvingo, VaPeacemaker Mapope vanoti Zanu PF yakatora chigaro muna 2013 nekubira nekudaro vechidiki rwendo runo vachachengetedza mavhoti evanhu kuti asabiwe kana kuvhota kwapera. Mubatanidzwa weMDC-Alliance unotiwo mutungamiriri wawo, VaChamisa vachakunda zvine mutsindo muMasvingo uye vanotarisira kuti vachagadzirisa hupenyu hwevanhu hwakange hwawondongwa neZanu PF. Kunyange kune vakwikwidzi makumi maviri nevatatu pasarudzo yemutungamirir wenyika, vazhinji vanoti makwikwi chaiwo ari pakati paVaChamisa nemutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

column2: Vagari Vodyira Marasha Kanzuru yeMasvingo
column3: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nekanzuru yavo nezuro rekuti itengere vakuru vemapazi nharembozha dzichadya mari inodarika zviuru makumi matanhatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vagari vakawanda vanoti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo zvinoratidza kuti haina shungu nekuita zvinhu zvinobatsira veruzhinji. Maminetsi emusangano wekanzuru wakaitwa nezuro anoratidza kuti kanzuru yakabuda nechisungo chekutenga nharembozha dzemhando yepamusoro soro dzekupa vakuru vemapazi ekanzuru gumi, pamwe nevetevedzeri vavo gumi. Vakuri vemapazi vachatengerwa Iphone7 iyo inoita zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora, vatevedzeri vavo vachitengerwa Samsung Galaxy S9, iyo inoita zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Izvi zvichadyira kanzuru mari inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Vagari vataura ne Studio7 vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vatungamiri vekanzuru havana hany'a nehupenyu hwevagari sezvo vachishandisa mari yakawanda kuzvinhu zvenhando, asi ivo vasina mvura yakakwana, migwagwa yakanaka uye marara asiri kutakurwa kanzuru ichiti mari yairi kuwana ishoma. Amai Sandra Muzenda, avo vanogara mumusha weSisk, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakuru vekanzuru vane humbimbindoga. Mumwe mugari, Muzvare Blessing Chimombo, vanotiwo havaoni chinobatsira nharembozha pakufambiswa kwebasa rekanzuru rakafana nekuti kushomeka kwemvura kupere mudhorobha. Kunyange zvekutengwa kwenharembozha izvi zvisimo mubhajeti rekanzuru ra2019, kanzuru inotarisirwa zvakare kuzobudisa mari yakawanda yekutengera vakuru ava muto wekudzishandisa mwedzi wega wega. Mubhajeti regore rino remari inosvika mamirioni maviri emadhora, kanzuru ichashandisa mari inosvika zviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora gore rose mukugadzirisa migwagwa, zvinoreva kuti mari yenharembozha yose inokwanisa kugadzirisa migwagwa yedhorobha kwemwedzi mumwe chete. Kanzuru inoshandisazve mari inoita zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora kutenga mishonga inochenesa mvura pagore, zvekuti mari yenharembozha inokwanisa kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura kwemwedzi miviri, vanhu vachiwana mvura yakachena muguta rine vanhu vosvika zviuru zana. Mari yenharembozha iyi inokwanisawo kutenga mafuta edzimotokari dzose dzekanzuru nedzekutakurisa marara mudzimba kwemwedzi mitatu, izvo zvinoita kuti zvirwere zvive zvishoma muguta. Naynzvi munyaya dzemari dzinotiwo, kanzuru, iyo iri kunetseka kuwanira musha wega wega bhini rawo, yaikwanisa kutenga mabhini zviuru zvisere zvopihwa vagari kuitira kuti vasarase marara pose pose. Mukuru webasa muMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti kanzuru iri kuita zvekutamba nemari yevagari. Kunyange izvi zvakabuda mumaminitsi emusangano wekupera kwemwedzi unopa mvumo kubasa rose rekanzuru richaitwa mwedzi unotevera, meya weguta, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti izvi hazvisati zvapasiswa. Vagari vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kusatenga nharembozha idzi yonangana nezvinhu zvinobatsira vagari. No media source currently available

column2: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuongororwa Hutachiwana hweCoronavirus Munyika Hunoramba Huchikwira
column3: Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vazivisa kuti munyika mave nevanhu vanosvika makumi manomwe nemakumi mana nemumwe vari kuongororwa kana vaine hutachiwana hwe coronavirus vanonzi vakabva kunyika dzine dambudziko rechirwere ichi. Dandemutande reTwitter rebazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti VaMoyo vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wemapazi akasiyanasiyana wekutarisa nezvegadziriro iripo pakudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi kuti chisapararira munyika. Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inonzi yasarudzawo zvipatara zviviri zvinoti Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Disease Hospital senzvimbo dzichashandiswa mukudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi. Coronavirus inonzi yauraya vanhu vanosvika mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevanomwe muChina chete, kuchitiwo mumwe chete kunze kweChina, kunove kuPhilippines. Vamwe zviuru makumi maviri nemazana manomwe nevana vanonzi vabatwawo nechirwere ichi muChina chete. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvehuutano Doctor Moyo kuti tinzwe zvizhinji panyaya iyi. Asi gurukota iri rakaudza Studio7 mukupera kwesvondo kuti bazi raro rakagadzirira kurwisana nehutachiwana uhwu. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, havaone sekunge hurumende yakagadzirira zvakakwana mukudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu sezvo vasati vambonzwa kana pave nevashandi vakadzidziswa kurwisana nedambudziko iri. Doctor Madzorera vanoti panofanirwa kutorwawo matanho akasimba ekuongorora vanopinda vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi, pachiitwawo zvakare matanho ekuvarambidza kupinda muvanhu sezvo chirwere ichi chiri nyore kuparadzirwa muvanhu. column2: Hazard asendeka shangu
column3: asendeka shangu dzekutambira nyika yake yeBelgium.   Mutambi uyu (31) akasarudza kusatambira nyika yake apo ichange ichirwira kuenda kumutambo we2024 European Championships uye ne2026 World Cup.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita chikwata chake kuWorld Cup kuQatar, Hazard asiya mushure mekutambira nyika yake kwemakore 14 apo ave kutarisira kumutsiridza hupenyu hwake hwenhabvu kuReal Madrid.   “Nhasi ndavhura chimwe chikamu. Ndokutendai nerudo,” Hazard anonyora paInstagram.   “Ndokutendai nerutsigiro rwenyu. Ndinokutendai nenguva yemafaro atakave navo kubva gore ra2008.   “Nhasi ndasarudza kusiya kutambira nyika yangu. Chikwata chitsva chevechidiki chagadzirira. Ndichakusuwai zvikuru.”   Bepanhau rekuBelgium Het Laastest Nieuws rakanyora kuti Hazard akange akurukura nevamwe vaanotamba navo nhabvu kuti anoda kusiya kutambira nyika yake kubva pavakaburitswa kuWorld Cup neCroatia.   Mazuva matanhatu akatevera, Hazard haana kushandura pfungwa dzake sezvo akabva azivisa vanhu 27.2 miriyoni vanomutevera paInstagram.   Matambiro ake muchikwata cheBelgium ange adzikira izvo zvakaona mutambo waakapedzisira kutambira nyika yake kuWorld Cup achipinzwa kwatambwa maminitsi anodarika 87 wave kunopera.   Akatanga kutambira Belgium aine makore 17 okuberekwa mugore ra2008 apo vakatamba neLuxembourg nemusi wa19 Mbudzi, 2008.   Mutambi uyu, uyo aimbove kuChelsea, akakwanisa kutambira nyika yake ka126, ndokunwisa ka33 uye achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka36.   Hazard akatungamira Belgium ari kaputeni mumitambo 56. – SportsMail Football

column2: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hapana Chichabuda Mukushanya kuZimbabwe kweNhumwa yeUnited Nations
column3: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti vari kukatyamadzwa zvikuru kuona kuti gwaro rabudiswa nehurumende pamusoro pevanhu vachasangana nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, hapana mapato anopikisa kana masangano akazvimirira. Amai Alena Douhan vari muZimbabwe mavari kutarisirwa kuongorora nyaya dzezvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakuru mubato reZanu-PF, pamwe chete nemabhizimisi avanodyidzana navo. Amai Douhan vachitarisirwawo kuongorora nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Gwaro rakabudiswa nehurumende rinoratidza kuti Amai Douhan vachangosangana nemakurukota ehurumende, vakuru veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission naJustice Luke Malaba. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College, kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti havaoni kuti rwendo rwaAmai Douhan pane zvaruchabudisa sezvo United Nations pachayo isina simba rekubvisa zvirango izvi, vachiti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa neAmerica, pamwe nemadzisahwira ayo, anosanganisa Britain nedzimwe nyika muEuropean Union. Vanoti chingabatsira vakatemerwa zvirango ndechekuti vataure nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi, vachiti panoenda VaMnangagwa kuBritain apa, vanogona kutaura nehurumende yeko, vachiratidza chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti Amai Douhan vanozikanwa zvikuru pamusoro peongororo dzavanoita munyika dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu, dzakaita seVenezuela, vachiti izvi zvinogona kukonzera kuti vakatemerwa zvirango muZimbabwe vasawana mukana wekumbotererwa nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi. column2: VaPromise Mkwananzi veTajamuka Vogariswa Mujeri
column3: Mutauriri weTajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi avo vakazvipira kumapurisa nemusi weChishanu vave kugara mutirongo mushure mekunge mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare ati haasi kunzwa zvakanaka akati nyaya iyi izonzwikwa neMuvhuro. VaMkwananzi vakaenda kunozvipira kumapurisa negweta ravo VaTrust Maanda vanova nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR. Rimwe rinova nhengo yeZLHR, VaJerremiah Bamu vakaudza Studio 7 kuti pavakaenda kumapurisa ekuHarare Central neimwe nyaya yavanhu vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwemusi weChitatu, vakaudzwa kuti mapurisa ari kutsvaga VaMkwananzi uye Pastor Evan Mawarire veHash Tag This Flag. Mapurisa ainge ambobvunzurudzawo VaStern Zvorwadza avo vari kutungamirawo kuratidzira munyika. VaMkwananzi vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vakazvipira kuenda kumapursa nekuti kuratidzira kwavari kuita kunotenderwa nebumbiro remutemo. Pastor Mawarire vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti pane vanhu vari kuvafonera vachiva tyisidzira uye kuvatevera nekuuya kuhofisi yavo. Mapuria akasunga vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu uye ari kutsvaga kusunga vamwe nekuyedza kudzisiva kumwe kuratidzira kwadaidzirwa nemusi weChitatu nemusi wechina svondo rinouya. Vari kuratidziora vanoda kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaferefete vari kuita zvehuori zvikuru makurukota avo, kutambirisa vashandi vehurumende mari dzavo dzemihoro nenguva uye kubvisa mutemo uri kurambidza kupinda kwezvinhu munyika zvakaita sezvekuduya zviri kutengeswa nevanhu kuti vararame. Vamwe vari kutiwo VaMugabe ngavasiye basa nekuti vakundikana. Asi VaMugabe nemusi weChishanu vakave nemukana wekutaura nezvezvichemo izvi apo vakaita musangano kunhandare yeChipadze kuBindura asi vakangoti zvinhu zvaoma nekuti Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango nevekunze.

column2: NDINI CHIBABA: KAMAMBO
column3: MUTuNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) — Felton Kamambo — anoti ndiye “Chibaba” chenhabvu yemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa anotonga kuCosafa kwake uko anotungamirawo.   Achitaura svondo radarika muHarare apo Zifa yaizivisa nyika kuti chizvarwa chekuCroatia, Zdravko Logarusic, ndiye ave murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors, Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake ndiro rinotonga zvenhabvu yemuno.   “Tisu tiri panyanga, tisu zvibaba zvenhabvu zvemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa ndiye chibaba chekuCosafa, ipapo panzwisisei. Saka muno zvese zvine chekuita nenhabvu zvinotodarika nepatiri isu uye tisu tinopasisa kuti zviite,” anodaro Kamambo.   Kubva Kamambo akapinda panyanga mugore ra2018 apo akunda Chiyangwa pasarudzo dzemutungamiri weZifa, pagara pachingotenderera mashoko ekuti vaviri ava vakarimirana muganhu. Vamwewo ndivo vaiti Chiyangwa aikonzera nyonga-nyonga yaiitika mubhodhi raKamambo nguva yadarika izvo zvakazoona Zifa ichimutemera zvirango pamwechete naOmega Sibanda uyo aive mutevedzeri wake kuti vasava nechekuita nezvenhabvu yemuno.   Zifa yakasvika padanho rekutombonyorera kuCosafa kuti Chiyangwa abviswe pachigaro chekutungamirira sangano iri.   Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake harichadi kupedza nguva richinetsana nevanhu pamusoro penyaya dzekutungana kwembudzi.   Anoti iye zvino yasvika nguva yekubatanidza vanhu vese kuburikidza nenhabvu nekudaro Zifa yakabviswa zvirango zvavainge vatemera Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Takagara pasi sebhodhi uye takazviona zvakakodzera kuti tiregerere Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Tabvisa zvirango zvese zvatainge takavatemera, saka tichienda mberi chikuru kuti nhabvu yedu ibudirire pane kuswera tichinetsana zvisina                            basa.   “Toda kuti bhora redu rinakidze ndizvo chete zvatinoda kwete zvimwe zvese,” anodaro Kamambo.   Zvakadaro, Logarusic — uyo akamborairidza Sudan — akapihwa basa guru rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo inosanganisira Africa Cup of Nations 2021 ne2022 World Cup.

column2: Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovaxin Konetsa Vanhu Vakawanda muZimbabwe
column3: Vanhu vakawanda vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovaxin vanoti vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba kuti vabayiwe nhomba yepiri. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti kabhodhoro kamwe chete kenhomba iyi, kanofanirwa kushandiswa kubaya vanhu gumi kana kachinge kavhurwa. Izvi zvabuda mutsvagiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 mushure mekunge yanzwa kuti pave nedambudziko guru rekuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin. Izvi zviri kuitika munzvimbo zhinji munyika yose. Mumwe wevanhu vakamirira kubayiwa nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin, Amai Simbiso Sinyoro,vati vaifanirwa kubayiwa nhomba iyi musi wa30 Chikumi, asi izvi hazvisati zvaitika. Amai Sinyoro vati kunyange hazvo vakawana kune nhomba iyi kuchipatara kuMbare vakaudzwa kunzi vanofanirwa kumirira kuti vanhu vatange vasvika gumi kuti vabayiwe nhomba iyi. Mumwe mukoti anobaya nhomba ataura neStudio 7 asina kuda kubuda pamhepo atiwo nhomba yavanayo yeCovaxin haigoni kuvhurwa kana pasina vanhu vakakwana vekubaya nhomba iyi. Mukoti uyu ati vanonyora mazita evanhu vozovazivisa kuti vauye kuzobayiwa musi wakati kana vanhu ava vakwana gumiAtsanangurawo kuti vanonyora vanhu mazita vozovazivisa kana vakwana gumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vachimiririra Chinhoyi mudare reNational Assembly, VaPeter Mataruse, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kumboshaikwa kwemishonga uku kunogona kuzokanganisa mashandiro akanaka enhomba. VaMataruse vatiwo zvekudzosera vanhu vambouya kuzobaiwa vasina kuwana nhomba zvinokonzerawo kuti vamwe vaore moyo vobva varega zvachose kubayiwa nhomba iyi. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati pan homba dzakadai, zvipatara zvinofanirwa kuzivisa veruzhinji mazuva ekuenda kunobayiwa nhomba kuitira kuti vagare vakagadzirira. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo ranga risati rawana zvinyunyuto zvekuti vari kuda nhomba yeCovaxin vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba vasati vabayiwa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kutambira nhomba dzeCovaxin zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, 35 000, kubva kuIndia muna Chivabvu, uye yakava nyika yemuAfria kutanga kushandisa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe ine mhando ina dzenhomba yeCovid-19 dzinoti Sinovax, Sinopharm, Sputnik V neCovaxin. Hurumende inoti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga kusvika nezuro vakanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvivatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe 793,077, uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezvisere nezana nemakumi matatu nevatatu, 568,133. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika. Hurumende yakazivisawo nezuro kuti vanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu mazana masere nevapfumbamwe, 809, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevasere (1878) . Vanhu vabatwa neCovid -19 munyika yose vava zviuru makumi mashanu nezvina nemazana mana ane nemakumi manomwe nevana, 54, 474. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichizivisa zvayawana nhasi. No media source currently available

column2: MaChevrons ofara
column3: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chigere mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita cheBangladesh mumitambo yeTwenty20 International Series (T20) pamwe chete neyeOne Day International (ODI).   MaChevrons ange aine makore anodarika mapfumbamwe asati ambokunda Bangladesh mumitambo yeODI, izvo akazoita svondo radarika apo akahwina mitambo miviri yavakatamba ndokuhwina series iyi vaine mumwe mutambo usati watambwa.   Mumitambo mitatu yeT20 yakatambwa nezvikwata zviviri izvi, maChevrons akahwina miviri, Bangladesh ndokuhwina mumwe chete kuchiti yeODI yatambwa kusvika pari zvino, maChevrons ahwina miviri (wechitatu wakatambwa bepa rino richitodhindwa).   Pamitambo iyi, mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza ange achitamba seakasvikirwa izvo zvakamuona achitamba cricket inonwisa mvura ndokubatsira maChevrons kuhwina. Anotungamira maChevrons, Regis Chakabva anoti kuhwina kwavakaita kwakaunza mufaro mukuru kuchikwata chavo pamwe nevatsigiri sezvo nguva yange yareba vasati vambokunda Bangladesh.   Anoti kushandura kwavakaita matambiro chimwe chezvikonzero zvakabatsira kuti vahwine mutambo uyu. “Nguva yange yareba tichitatarika kukunda Bangladesh asi tadzoka, ndinoona kunge kushandura matambiro kwatakaita ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kuti tinge tiri patiri nhasi, tichitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro.   “Asi nguva pfupi yadarika tange tichibata mhando yecricket yepamusoro, uye Sikandar Raza semitambo yadarika, ange achitamba cricket zvinonwisa mvura. “Tinovimba kuti tikaramba takadaro tinoenda mberi tichisimukira sechikwata,” akadaro Chakabva.   Vatsigiri vecricket vamwe vange vachiti kudzorwa kwakaita Dave Houghton kuzorairidza maChevrons ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kushandura matambiro emaChevrons ayo ange achingohwina mitambo yose yaange achitamba kunze kwemumwe weT20i uyo vakakundwa neBangladesh asi vakazohwina mutambo wose sezvo pamitambo mitatu maChevrons akakunda pamiviri.

column2: Zimbabwe Yova Nyika Yekutanga muAfrica Kubaya Vanhu Jekiseni reMushonga weHIV/AIDS
column3: Zimbabwe nemusi weChina yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza World Aids Day vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vachiti pane zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa kuti Zimbabwe izadzise donzvo rekupedza denda iri panozosvika 2030 . Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yekutanga muAfrica kushandisa mushonga wejekiseni rekudzikisa hukasha hwechirwere cheHIV rinonzi cabotegravir uye nyanzvi dzinoti iri kuita zviri nani kurwisa denda iri kudarika nyika dzakawanda. Dunhu reSADC ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi pasi rose zvikuru muSouth Africa. Vachitaura kumhemberero dzaitwa kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium nhasi mukuru weNational Aids Council, Doctor Bernard Madzima vatiwo zvakakosha kuti munhu wese akwanise kuwana rubatsiro kana ane chirwere cheHIV/AIDS vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinobatsira nyika kuti ikwanise kuzadzikisa chiga chekuderedza nekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vachitaura neStudio 7 Amai Martha Tholanah vave nemakore makumi maviri nerimwe vachirarama nehutachiona hweHIV/ AIDS vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko akadai sehurombo nemhirizhonga yekushungurudzwa kwevana vadIko pabonde mukuedza kuzadzikisa tarisiro yekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Amai Tholanah vatiwo mapiritsi anoshandiswa nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS anogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko nekudaro zvakakosha kuti nyika iise zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehutachiona vaongororwe pachena nguva nenguva zvinhu zvakadai sechiropa neitsvo . Mumwezve anorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Pastor Maxwell Kapachawo vati kupedza dambudziko rekupararira kwehutachiona zvakakosha kuti nyika igadzirise matambudziko arimunyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Olive Thabeni mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS reLife Empowerment Support Organisation vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi vabatsirwe kudzivirira zvimwe zvirwere zvakadai segomarara rechibereko pachena . Zuva reWorld Aids Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa1Zvita gore negore richishandiswa sezuva rekurangarira avo vakashaya ne kuda kwechirwere cheAIDS pamwe nekuyeuchidzana nezvechirwere ichi. Zuva iri rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988 zvakurudzirwa nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation. Dingindira regore rino ririkukurudzira kuti munhu wese anorarama nehutachiona awane kubatsirika zvisinei nechimiro chake. No media source currently available

column2: Haisi nguva yekufunga nhabvu, asi upenyu: PSL
column3: PREMIER Soccer League (PSL) inoti ichamirira kuudzwa pamwe nekupihwa mvumo neSport and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti nhabvu izotanga kutambwa zvekare zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa pamwe chete nemimwe mitambo apo mukombe weChibuku Super Cup wange uri pakati pekutambwa.   Nguva pfupi yadarika apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakatanga kukwira zvekare, SRC yakamisa mitambo yose kunze kweyezvikwata zvichamirira nyika zvinosanganisira maWarriors ayo ari kuSouth Africa uko ari mumitambo yeCosafa Cup kozoita chikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chiri kubandana necheBangladesh mumitambo yeTest match, one day international netwenty20 series. Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy “Kenny” Ndebele – anoti sePSL, vari kukoshesa mitemo yose yeHurumende yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye havasi kufunga nezvekudzoka kwenhabvu pari zvino sezvo chinhu chikuru chavari kukoshesa utano neupenyu hweveruzhinji.   “Utano neupenyu hweruzhinji ndizvo zvakakosha panguva ino, saka ngatimbomire zvekufunga kuti nhabvu inodzoka rinhi kana kuti tichatanga kuitamba rinhi apo vamwe vanhu vari kufa.   “SePSL tiri kutevedzera zvose zvatinenge taudzwa kuti tiite neSRC neHurumende nekuti denda iri riri kuuraya vanhu uye nguva ino yatiri haina kumira zvakanaka zvachose. Kana nguva yekuti nhabvu ichidzoka ikakwana ndine chivimbo kuti SRC ichatizivisa ipapo tobva tasimudzira mutambo weChibuku Super Cup uyo watakambosendeka parutivi kwazvino.   “Ino inguva yekuti tichengetedze upenyu hweveruzhinji,” anodaro Ndebele. Ndebele anoenderera mberi achiti kudzoka kwenhabvu yePSL kuri mumaoko eSRC saka naizvozvo ivo vachangotevedzera gwara ravanenge vaziviswa kuti vagofamba naro.   “Zvinhu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, isu hatikwanise kupikisa mitemo yeHurumende. Covid-19 iriko uye kana zvichinzi mitambo imbomira kuitira kuti vanhu vachengetedzeke, ndizvo zvatinotevedzera izvozvo.   “Saka gwara ratichapihwa maringe nekuzodzoka kwenhabvu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, ndiyo inotiudza zvekuti totevedzera saizvozvo,” anodaro. Apo zvimwe zvikwata zvange zvichiendesa vatambi vazvo kunobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, Kwayedza yakaedza kubvunza kuna Ndebele kuti vari kuona sei mafambiro ari kuita nyaya dzekubaiwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19 muzvikwata zvavo uye zvikwata zvose zvati zvaenda here, iye ndokupindura achiti, “Panguva ino hatisati tave kukwanisa kutaura nezvenyaya iyoyo, tichazokuzivisai pamberi apo kuti zvingani zvabaisa vatambi vazvo nhomba yeCovid-19.   “Asi semutemo wenyika wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, zvakakosha kuti munhu wese anobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19.”

column2: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Chirwere cheShuga neKudya Zvine Hutano
column3: Zimbabwe nhasi yatabatana nenyika dzepasi rese kucherechedza zuva rechirwere cheshuga kana kuti World Diabetes Day veruzhinji vachikurudzirwa kuvhenekwa navanachiremba, kudya chikafu chine hutano uye chinoita kuti vasabatwe nedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzashandisa zuva ranhasi kuongorora vanhu pachena pamwe nekuvadzidzisa pamusoro pudenda iri. Mumwe murapi pane chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira muHarare, Amai Fungai Priscillar Gomba vati hirwere cheshuga chiriri kupararira munyika asi munhu anogona kurarama pasina dambudziko kana atavedza dzidziso kubva kunana chiremba. Vanoti zvimwe zvikonzero zvinoita kuti vanhu vabatwe shuga kana kuti diabetes inyaya yekuzvarwa mumhuri ine nhoorondo yechirwere ichi, mararamire anoita munhu nechikafu chaanodya kana kuti kuti Lifestyle pachirungu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kungorora vanhu kuti vane denda iri here pamwe nekuti vangararame sei vasingapinde munjodzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekuongorora zvirwere, VaEdmore Mahureva, vanoti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kuita ongororo dzakaita seHBCa1 yekungoora shuga yemunhu mukati memwedzi mitatu yapfuura uye vaita izvi pachena vachiti zvinobatsira kuti munhu azive pamire nedenda iri. Mutungamiriri wesangano remachiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, re Medical and Dental Private Practitioners Association Dr Johannes Marisa kuti nhasi vange vachibatsirawo vanhu pachena kuti vasafe nedenda iri. Amai Maonei Tiki avo vakabatwa shuga muna Chikumi gore rino uye vakatobviswa gumbo nekuda kwedenda iri vanoti vafara chose neruzivo rwavawana nhasi. Ambuya Agnes Zioni ndevamwe vari kurarama nedenda iri uye vanoti zvakakosha kutevedza dzidziso yanachiremba. Gore rapfuura, shuga yakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 3,400 uye zvinofundidzirwa kuti denda iri rinobata munhu mumwe chete pavanhu gumi pasi rese. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day iro rinocherechedzwa musi 14 Mbudzi, racherechedzwa pasi pendingindira rine chinangwa chekuti vanhu vawane zivo yakakwana kuti vakwanise kurapwa nekuita kurarama nzira dzinoita kuti denda iri risarambe richipararira kana kuti Education to Protect Tomorrow, Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi kana mashoko ehurumende pazuva iri sezvo mutauriri webazi iri VaDonald Mujiri vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu patataenda pamhepo.

column2: Vamwe Voyaura Zvichitevera Kupera kweMabasa nePamusana peCovid-19
column3: Vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19 vanoti vari kutambura zvikuru sezvo vasina chekubata. Mumwe wevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa, Va Luck Moyo, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vave kudya kamwe chete pazuva kubva pavakasiya basa kukambani yavaishandira. VaMoyo vanoti basa ravo rinokwanisa kuraramisa mhuri yavo asi ikozvino havakwanisi kuenda kunoita basa iri sezvo vasina tsamba inovapa mvumo yokuenda kunzvimbo yavanenge vadaidzwa. Mumwe akatarisana nedambudziko iri, Muzvare Melissa Jairosi, avo vane dhigiri reEngineering, vanoti vakapererwa nebasa muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapera pakambani inoita zvokuvaka. Vanoti nekushaya chekuita, vakafunga kuita basa rekutengesa hembe dzemumabhero nemuriwo wavanotenga kuMbare, sezvo vari kushaya basa ravakadzidzira kuEngland. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Mary Makuyana, vanoti vakamiswa basa vachangotanga kupfuya huku kumba kwavo zvokuti ndizvo zvave kuvararamisa. Asi vanoti bhizimisi radzikira nokuti vanhu vavaitengesera huku idzi kum hofisi emuguta vakamiswawo mabasa uye mahofisi makuru akavharwa kubva gore rakapera. Muzvare Dadiso Mudziwepasi vanoti vakadzingwa basa muchitoro chinotengesa zvokudya nembatya zvokuti vave kushanda mumba memumwe mudzimai ane tuckshop pamba pake, asi vanoti mari yavanotambira haisi kuvakwanira nemhuri yavo. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Gift Mutasa, vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa hurukuro nehurumende kuti pawanikwe nzira dzokubatsira vanhu vane mabhizimisi akaparara uye nekubatsira vanhu vakadzingwa mabasa nenyaya yeCovid 19 iyo yakavharisa nyika. VaMutasa vanoti huwori ndihwo hwasvitsa nyika pairi nhasi nokuti zviri pachena kuti mabhizimisi ari kubudirira ane chekuita nevanhu vari kutonga nyika ino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo nekuda kweCovid-19. Gurukota revashandi nemagariro evanhu akanaka, Professor Paul Mavhima, vakaudza Studio7 nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19. Asi masangano anomirira vagari pamwe neevashandi munyika anoti hapana ruyamuro rwuri kupihwa vanhu nehurumende kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino. No media source currently available

column2: ZEC Inoramba Mashoko eKuti Vanhu Vavhota muSarudzo dzeBy-Election kuChipinge Ward 16 Vanga Vachimanikidzwa Kuratidza Pavavhotera
column3: Sarudzo dzema by-elections dzaitwa nhasi kuChipinge Rural District Ward 16 nekuKariba Ward 5, dzinonzi dzafamba zvakanaka kunyange hazvo kuchinzi kwanga kuine huwandu hwevanhu vabatsirwa kuvhota, zvikuru kuChipinge. Zvinonziwo kuChipinge vamwe vanhu vanga vachiudzirwa pekuvhotera uye kuti vatore mifananidzo yemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana vasarudza vavanoda kuratidza kuti vavhotera ani. Asi Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaburitsa mashoko ekuti manyepo kuti vanhu vavhota musarudzo yeWard 16 by-election kuChipinge Rural District vanga vachimanikidzwa kutora mifananidzo yemagwaro ekuvhotesa vachiratidza pavavhotera. Mashoko aburitswa nemukuru wezvesarudzo muZEC, VaUtoile Silaigwana, anoti vashandi veZEC vanoziva chose kuti zviri kunze kwemutemo wesarudzo kuti vanhu vatore mifananidzo panzvimbo dziri kuvhoterwa, kunze kwekunge vatopiwa mvumo. Vanotiwo zviri kunze kwemutemo kuti munhu aratidze paavhotera. Kunyange hazvo paita zvimhingamipinyi zvakadai, vanhu vanonzi vabuda kunovhota vane huwandu zvichienzaniswa nesarudzo dzema by-election dzadarika. Vanga vachitevera sarudzo idzi vari kuChipunge Rural District Ward 5, mukuru vesangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vaudza studio 7 kuti dzafamba murunyararo asi vaona kuti vanhu vanga vachibatsirwa kuvhota vanga vakawandisa. VaMadhuku vatiwo vaona kuti madzimai ndiwo anga akawanda kudarika vanhu vose vavhota. KuKariba, mukuru anoona nezvemabasa musangano rinoongorora sarudzo, reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzose dzaitwa murunyararo, sangano ravo raona kuti vanhu vanga vachinovhota vari muzvikwata zvikwata, zvikuru kuChipinge, kuita sekunge vanga vachiita zvekutinhwa. VaKwikwidzana kuChipinge vanoti Amai Gladys Muposhi veZanu PF, Va Rapheus Sithole veCCC, VaRemeredzai Ziki veNational Constitutional Assembly pamwe naVaZachariah Sigauke vebato re Patriotic Zimbabweans. Vakwikwidzana kuKariba ndaVaKudakwashe mafusire veZanu PF naVaTonderai Chikwati veCCC. Zvabuda musarudzo zvanga zvisati zvaziviswa pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

column2: Tino Kadewere ava kutambira kuSpain
column3: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Tinotenda Philana Kadewere, aendeswa kuchikwata cheReal Club Deportivo Mallorca chekuSpain nechikwereti uko achatambira nhabvu yake mwaka uno achibva kuOlympic Lyon.   Chibvumirano chiri kuona Kadewere achienda kuMallorca chinosanganisira kuti chikwata ichi chinogona kuzomutenga kuita mutambi wavo zvachose kana akatamba zvinogutsa mwaka uno.   Kadewere abva aita mutambi wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe achinotambira nhabvu yake muligi reSpanish LaLiga.   Kuendeswa kwaaita kuMallorca neLyon kunotevera kushaiswa mukana wekutamba kwaange achiita zvichitevera kudzoka kwaAlexandre Lacazette kuchikwata chekuFrance ichi.   Pamusoro pezvo, kuArsenal kune vamwe vatambi vanoti Karl Toko Ekambi anobva kuCameroon, Mathis Cherki wekuFrance naMoussa Dembele wekuFrance zvakare avo vange vachitambiswa pamberi pake.

column2: MaChevrons osangana neIreland
column3: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chichatanga goredzva ra2023 nekusangana neIreland mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeTwenty20 International Games (T20).   Zvichitevera kudzoka kwakaita maChevrons kubva kuAustralia nguva yadarika kuWorld Cup uko akadadisa nekusvika kuSuper 12, uyu ndiwo uchaita mutambo wavo wekutanga gore rinotevera.   Zimbabwe Cricket yakazivisa kuti mitambo yemaChevrons neIreland yese yeODI neT20 ichatambirwa kunhandare yeHarare Sports Club.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichitanga kubandana mumitambo yeT20 mazuva anoti 12, 14 na15 Ndira. Mitambo yeT20 painongopera, yeODI inobva yatanga uye ichatambwa nemusi wa18, 20 na23 Ndira.   Chikwata chaDave Houghton ichi chiri kutarisira kutanga goredzva nekuhwina mutambo uyu sezvo kubva pakadzoka murairidzi uyu, chakatanga kutamba cricket inonwisa mvura.

column2: America Yovhota Musarudzo dza2020
column3: Mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni evanhu ari kuvhota musarudzo dzemuAmerica dzemutungamiri wenyika, pamwe nedzenhengo dzeparamende. Asi maziso evakawanda akatarisira zvichabuta pakati pemumiriri weRepublican Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump pamwe nemumiriri weDemocratic Party musarudzo iyi, VaJoe Biden. Nzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzavhurwa mangwanani mumatunhu ose emuAmerica.  VaBiden vatanga zuva ravo nekupinda muchechi mudunhu ravo reDelaware uye vazopinda munzvimbo mbiri dziri mudunhu re Pennsylvania vachiona vanhu vari kuvhota, vasati vadzokera kudunhu ravo reDelaware. VaTrump, avo vanova mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, vatanga hurongwa hwavo nekutaura pachirongwa che Fox & Friends vachiti vachazivisa veruzhinji kana vachinge vakunda musarudzo.  Va Trump vashanyira muzinda wavo wesarudzo uri kunze kweguta reWashington, ndokubva vazodzokera kumba kwavo kumuzinda wemutungamiri weAmerica, we White House. VaBiden vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa masangano enhau kuti vawana mavhoti anoita kuti vave mutungamiri wenyika. Sarudzo dzemuAmerica dziri kuitika panguva iyo nyika iyi yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere che Covid-19, icho chauraya vanhu banodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nechimwe, kana kuti vanodarika 231,000. Zvisineyi nedenda iri, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu vari kutarisirwa kuvhota musarudzo yegore rino. Asi zvichabuda musarudzo idzi zvichaburitswa pachitevedza mitemo yematunhu akasiyana siyana. Matunhu achatanga kuzivisa zvabuda musarudzo anosanganisira Florida, Georgia, Maryland, Pennsylvania, Delaware, Virginia, New York, Connecticut nemamwe. Kuti munhu adomwe semutungamiri wenyika akunda musarudzo, anofanirwa kunge awana mavhoti eElectoral College anodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe.

column2: Vanhu Vatatu Vanofa neCOVID-19 paNguva Iyo Huwandu hweVari Kuwanikwa Vaine Denda Hwakwira
column3: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa neChipiri mangwanani kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neMuvhuro neCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vakawanikwa vaine denda iri Muvhuro wakare hwakakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 2 555. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu vafa neCovid-19 vave pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu, kana kuti 4 713, kuchitiwo vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 kubva patanga chirwere ichi munyika vakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe namazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 141 601. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nezvitatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 3,882 255 vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 pakupera kwezuva neMuvhuro. Vamwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 2,892 366, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri sezvinokurudzirwa. Huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 uhwu huri kukwira kubva pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 523, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri nemusi weSvondo, kuchitiwo neMugovera vanhu chiuru nemakumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 082, vakawanikwawo vaine Covid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti hutachiwana hweOmicron hwakanga hwawanikwa munyika pavanhu makumi mashanu vakavhenekwa kuMasvingo. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira hutano hwakanaka munharaunda, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti havasi kushamisika nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 mazuvano sezvo paine kuvarairwa kweveruzhinji kwakanyanya. VaRusike vanoti nekupinda munyika kwehutachiwana hweOmicron, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo kupararira kweCovid-19, dzakaita sekugeza maoko, kupfeka mamasiki, kugara madaranganwa pamwe nekusaenda munzvimbo dzakawanda vanhu. column2: Vanhu Vofarira Hurongwa Hunokweretesa Mari Midziyo Ichiitwa Chibatiso
column3: Vemabhizinesi madiki nemamwe achiri kusimukira vanoti vari kufara nechirongwa chebhanga guru renyika chekuti vakwanise kukwereta mari vachishandisa midziyo yavo sechibatiso. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wezuva rimwe chete wapindwa nevamabhizinesi madiki uyo waitirwa kwaMutare. Vachitaura mushure memusangano uyu, mumwe muzvinabhizinesi, VaSondon Mugaradzoko, vati danho riri kutorwa nebhanga guru renyika richishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Association of Micro Finance Institutions, Zamfi, richabatsira zvikuru, sezvo mabhanga mazhinji achiomesera mabhizinesi madiki kana achida kukwereta mari kumabhanga aya. Mumwe apindawo mumusangano uyu, VaPeter Mavhiri, vatiwo kushandiswa kwezvipfuyo kunopa kuti vekumaruwa vakwanise kukwereta sezvo vasina maTitle Deeds pazvivakwa zvavo. Mukuru we Zamfi, Va Godfrey Chitambo, vanoti sangano ravo, iro rine nhengo zana neshanu, rakatanga hurongwa uhu mushure mekunge raona matambudziko ari kusangana nevemabhizinesi madiki ekuti vawane mari yekusimudzira mabasa avo apo vanenge vasina zvibatiso zvinodikanwa. Mumiriri webhanga guru renyika pamusangano uyu, Amai Grace Chiromo, vati kurerutsa kuwanikwa kwezvikwereti kuchapa budiriro munyika. Vatiwo vari mushishi kuti pave nemutemo wekutambira zvibatiso zvitsva izvi kuitira kuti zvicherechedzwe pazvibvumirano zvekukweretesana. Vanhu vangangosvika makumi manomwe vapinda mumusangano uyu, uye mumwe musangano wakadai uchaitwa kuMasvingo neBulawayo svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

column2: Zanu PF Inoita Sarudzo dzeKutsvaga Hutungamiri hweMatunhu
column3: Sarudzo dzebato reZanu PF dzekutsvaga vatungamiriri vematunhu dzaitwa nhasi mumatunhu ose emunyika, uye zvizhinji zvabuda musarudzo idzi zvihaziviswa mangwana. Munzvimbo dzakawanda muHarare dzinosanganisira Mbare neHopley vanhu vatanga kuvhota mangwanani sezvange zvakarongwa. Asi kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaita seMufakose vanhu vatanga kuvhota panguva dzekuma3 masikati zvekuti kusvika pari zvino vachiri kuverenga zvabuda musarudzo. Amai Lisa Makoni, vanove sachigaro wemadzimai muMaurice Nyagumbo district kuHarare South Constituency, vaudza Studio7 kuti sarudzo dzafamba zvakanaka munzvimbo mavo. Vachitaura mushure mekuvhota paStodart Hall kuMbare, mutevedzeri weWomen’s League muMbare 1 District, Ambuya Garise, vati sarudzo dzekutsvaga hutungamiriri hutsva hwedunhu ravo dzafamba zvakanaka kunyange hazvo pange paine vakawanda vari kuda zvigaro. Vamwewo ambuya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara kuti sarudzo dzabuda zvakanaka uye vati vachagara paStodart Hall kudzamara zvabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa. Murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvichemo zvavange vanzwa kusvika pari zvino ndezvekuti kune dzimwe nzvimbo vanhu vanooka kutanga kuvhota. Vati vange vakamirira kunzwa zvizere kubva kumatunhu ese munyika. VaBimha vatiwo vanotarisira kuti kuverengwa kwemavhoti kunopera mangwana. Kunyange hazvo sarudzo idzi dzichinzi dzafamba zvakanaka, vamwe vakabuda musarudzo idzi vati vaityityidzirwa. VaaLazarus Dokora vekuMashonaland Centra vanoti vakabuda musarudzo idzi sezvo zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Nhasi, VaAbia Mujere vazivisa kuti havachapinda musarudzo, asi havana kupa zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti. KuMashonaland East, VaOzias Bvute, vakarambidzwa kukukwidza zvisina tsarukano kunyange hazvo zita ravo raimbenge ratambirwa nePolitiburo. VaBimha vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanenge vatyityidzirwa vanofanira kumhan’ara kubato kuti vanenge vaita izvi vatorerwe matanho. Mune makwikwi anotyisa muZanu PF zvekuti pamatunhu ese munyika, VaLarry Mavhima, ndivo vega vakashaya anovakwikwidza pachinzvimbo chasachigaro wedunhu reMidlands. MuHarare mune vanhu vashanu vari kuda chigaro ichi vanoti, VaChris Chuchu, VaGoodwills Masimirembwa,VaGodwin Gomwe, VaJason Pasade naVaBoniface Karoro. No media source currently available

column2: Vanopikisa Vanoti VaMliswa Ndivo Vanofanirwa Kumirira Hurungwe West Kwete VaGuzah
column3: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kushorwa zvakanyanya nemabatiro ayakaita sarudzo yemuHurungwe West, uko inoti VaKeith Guzah veZanu-PF vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo kunyange hazvo vange vasiri mugwaro revavhoti. ZEC inoti VaGuzah vakakumbira kuti vabviswe kuMagunje vachienda kuHurungwe West asi pakaita matambudziko pakuita izvi zvakapa kuti izvi zvisaitwe. Asi ZEC inoti kubvumidza kwayakaita VaGuzah kuti vavhoterwe musarudzo yeHurumengwe West zviri pamutemo. ZEC yatendawo kuti VaGuzah havana kukwanisa kuvhota nekuda kwekuti zita ravo rainge risiri mugwaro revavhoti mudunhu iri. VaGuzah vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavangataure panyaya iyi pari zvino. Asi vakakwikwidza musarudzo iyi vakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti VaGuzah havafanire kunge vachimirira Hurungwe West nekuti mapepa avo avakashandisa pasrudzo iyi akange asina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available Mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, uye vari muzvinafundo panyaya yemitemo, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti mashoko eZEC anoshoresa zvikuru. VaMadhuku vanoti kana VaGuzah zita ravorakanga risiri mugwaro revavhoti zvinoreva kuti havana kodzero dzekuvhoterwa mudunhu iri izvo zvinopa kuti VaMliswa vagadzwe semumiriri wedunhu iri muparamende. column2: Amai Makarau Vobvuma Kuti Chirongwa cheBVR Chine Zvinetswa
column3: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu vari kuvhota vange vakaatarisira sezvo chirongwa chavo chekunyoresa vavhoti chichiri kutanga. ZEC yakatanga kunyoresa vanhu kuvhota nemusi weMuvhuro kunyange hazvo vamwe vari kuchema chema kuti havana ruzivo rwakakwana nezvechirongwa ichi. Mimwe michina inonzi yange ichimboramba kushanda zvakanaka kumatunhu makumi matanhatu nematatu munyika yose. Amai Makarau vasimbisawo kuti vanhu vanokwanisa kunyoresa nezvitupa zvesimbi uye vanofanira kuuya netsamba dzinoratidza kwavanogara kuti vakwanise kukurumidza kunyoreswa. ZEC inoti inotarisira kuti muchina mumwe chete unge uchinyoresa vanhu makumi masere pazuva. No media source currently available

column2: Vari kuMaruwa Vokurudzirwa Kuzvidzivirira kuCovid-19
column3: Kunyange hazvo denda reCovid-19 richiri munyika vanhu vakawanda kumaruwa ekuMashonaland East anosanganisira Murehwa vari kufamba vasina kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano zvinogona kukonzora kuparararira kwechirwere ichi. Vanhu vakawanda vekumaruwa vanoona sekuti vanhu vemumadhorobha ndivo vanonyanyobatwa neCovid-19. VaIrimai Chakaza, avo vanogara kuMurehwa West, vanoti vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo yavo havakosheshi zvekupfeka mamasiki munguva ino yekurwisa chirwere che Covid-19. VaChakaza vanoti vanozviza kuti chirwere ichi chinouraya asi havasati vaona pachakauraya izvo vati zviri kukonzera veruzhinji kuti vasatora matanho anokurudzirwa kupararira kwacho. Mumwe mugari, VaTakunda Mabaya, vanoti hapana kurudziro yakanyanya iri kuitwa kumaruwa sezvinoitwa kumadhorobha. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri kuita kuti vasaite hany’a nekutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira. Asi vachitaura nevatsigiri vebato ravo muzvimbo iyi, murongi wemisangano muMDC Alliance, VaAmos Chibaya, vakayambira vagari ava kuti vakoshese zvavanoudzwa nenyanzvi pamusoro pechirwere ichi vachiti chinouraya. Imwe nhengo yerimwe sangano rinoshandira kumaruwa eChipinge neChimanimani, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti dambudziko rekusapfeka mamasiki ririko kwavanoshandira uye vanorwisana naro zuva nezuva. Vatiwo zvinoburitswa muongororo dziri kuitwa pamusoro pechirwere ichi zuva nezuva zvinoratiddza kuti chirwere ichi chakawandira kumaguta akaita seHarare neBulawayo izvo zvave kuita kuti vanhu varivare kumaruwa. Vaombove gurukota rezvehutano panguya yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Stduio7 kuti zviri kuitika kumaruwa zvine ngozi yakakura. Dr Madzorera vanoti dambudziko iri rinowanikwawo mumisha inogara veruzhinji mumaguta uye chirwere ichi chinogona kuputika zvakare kana vanhu vakarega kutevedza zvakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation pakudzivirira Covid-19.
